description.hltext_display: TETRIS สุดคลาสสิก กับคุณสมบัติที่เหนือกว่าเฉพาะบน PS3 : TGN_UPDATES (0)
description.content:
( http://www.thaigamernetwork.com / http://www.facebook.com/ThaiGamerNetwork / http://twitter.com/TGNgaming )
( http://asia.playstation.com/th/en )
Electronic Arts Inc., และ Blue Planet Software, Inc. บริษัทผู้ถือครองลิขสิทธิ์ตระกูล Tetris แต่เพียงผู้เดียว ได้ประกาศวางจำหน่าย Tetris สำหรับ PlayStation Network ประเทศไทยแล้ววันนี้ ในราคา 300 บาท เจ้าของเครื่อง PlayStation 3 จะมีโอกาสได้สัมผัสกับเกมที่มีกราฟิกคมชัดระดับ 1080p ระบบเสียงรอบทิศทางคุณภาพสูงแบบ 5.1 และการเล่นรูปแบบใหม่อย่างการแข่ง Tetris กับผู้เล่นคนอื่น ๆ จากทั่วโลกผ่านระบบออนไลน์ เกม Tetris เป็นหนึ่งในเกมที่ขายดีที่สุดตลอดกาล ด้วยยอดผู้ซื้อผ่านการดาวน์โหลดกว่า 100 ล้านครั้งในปัจจุบัน?ในตอนนี้ EA ได้พัฒนาเกม Tetris ลงบนเครื่องเกมกว่า 15 แพลตฟอร์มแล้วด้วยกันครับ และเราก็ตื่นเต้นที่จะให้ผู้เล่นได้สัมผัสกับตัวเกมเวอร์ชั่น PlayStation Network กันมาก ๆ ครับ? Adam Sussman รองประธานฝ่ายผลิตสากลของ EA Mobile กล่าว ?ด้วยการเล่นรูปแบบใหม่ ภาพลักษณ์แบบความละเอียดสูงตระการตา และเสียงประกอบที่ดีกว่า มันจึงจะมอบประสบการณ์ Tetris ที่ดีที่สุดบน PlayStation Network ให้ผู้เล่นได้สัมผัสกันครับ??Tetris ภาคนี้ถูกสร้างขึ้นมาเผื่อเล่นกับจอโทรทัศน์โดยเฉพาะครับ? Alexey Pajitnov ผู้สร้างเกม Tetris กล่าว ?เราตื่นเต้นกันมากที่จะได้นำ Tetris มาลง PlayStation Network มันจะมาพร้อมกับโหมดใหม่ ๆ ซึ่งมีการเล่นหลากหลายรูปแบบให้ได้เลือกสนุกกันครับ ด้วยกราฟิกความละเอียดสูงและเสียงประกอบรอบทิศทาง เกม Tetris ภาคนี้จึงเป็นภาคที่สมบูรณ์แบบที่สุด เราอยากจะทำให้มันออกมาอย่างมีเอกลักษณ์และเล่นได้สนุกทั้งแฟนรุ่นเก๋าและผู้เล่นหน้าใหม่ และเราก็หวังว่าทุกคนจะได้ลองเล่นมันให้กระหึ่มบ้านกันเลยนะครับ?นอกจากเสียงประกอบรอบทิศทางแบบคุณภาพสูงแล้ว ผู้เล่น Tetris ยังสามารถเล่นพร้อมกันกับเพื่อนได้สูงสุดถึง 6 คนทั้งในแบบออนไลน์และออฟไลน์ด้วยการเล่นรูปแบบใหม่ในโหมดต่าง ๆ ของตัวเกม สำหรับใครที่เล่นเข้าขากันได้เป็นอย่างดี โหมด Shared จะให้ผู้เล่น 2 คนได้ร่วมทีมกันเพื่อเคลียร์บล็อกในตารางเดียวกัน และในทางกลับกัน โหมด Team Battle ก็จะให้ผู้เล่น 2 ทีม ทีมละ 2 คนได้ปะทะกันในโหมดสุดยอดของการแข่งขัน ผลัดกันรุกและรับเพื่อค้นหาผู้ชนะที่แท้จริง หรือแม้แต่โหมด Battle ที่เป็นที่รู้จักกันเป็นอย่างดีก็จะยังมีพลังพิเศษรูปแบบใหม่มาเพื่อเพิ่มความสนุกให้กับการเล่นด้วย
แฟนขาประจำของ Tetris ก็ไม่ต้องกังวล เพราะ Tetris สำหรับ PlayStation Network ก็จะมีโหมด Marathon มาให้เล่นเช่นเคย แต่มันจะมาพร้อมกับความเปลี่ยนแปลงบางอย่าง โดยคราวนี้ผู้เล่นจะสามารถเล่นโหมด Marathon พร้อมกันได้ถึง 4 คนในแบบออฟไลน์ อีกทั้งยังมีโหมด Challenge เพิ่มเข้ามาใหม่ ซึ่งจะให้ผู้เล่นได้แข่งกับ ?รีเพลย์? ของเพื่อน ๆ หรือผู้เล่น Tetris ฝีมือฉกาจระดับโลกด้วย นอกจากนี้ ผู้เล่นยังสามารถตรวจสอบอันดับของตนบนตารางอันดับรวมทั่วโลกแบบออนไลน์ได้ ซึ่งตารางอันดับจะถูกล้างใหม่ทุกสัปดาห์
( ภาพขนาดใหญ่: http://www.thaigamernetwork.com/news.php?nid=756 )
คุณสมบัติ? เกม Tetris อันเป็นที่รักของทุกคนซึ่งมาพร้อมด้วยสิ่งใหม่ ๆ เลื่อนและหมุนบล็อกของคุณให้เข้าที่เข้าทางในโหมด Marathon และโหมดอื่น ๆ อีก 12 รูปแบบ หรือแม้แต่ท้าทายความสามารถของตัวเองกับรีเพลย์ของผู้เล่นคนอื่น ๆ จากทั่วโลก? โหมดหลายผู้เล่น 6 รูปแบบ: เล่นแข่งผ่านระบบออนไลน์ได้ถึง 6 คนในโหมด Timed Battle หรือยืนหยัดเป็นคนสุดท้ายในโหมด Battle หรือเล่นโหมด Marathon หรือโหมดอื่น ๆ พร้อมกับเพื่อนอีก 3 คนในแบบออฟไลน์ก็ยังได้? เอกสิทธิ์สำหรับเครื่อง PlayStation 3: ใช้พลังพิเศษต่าง ๆ ในโหมด Battle เพื่อความสนุกสุดยอด ร่วมกันเคลียร์บล็อกกับเพื่อนจากทั่วโลกในโหมด Shared และสัมผัสกับโหมด Team Battle ที่จะให้คุณจัดทีมปะทะกันแบบฝั่งละ 2 คน? คุณสมบัติที่มากกว่า: ตารางอันดับแบบออนไลน์ ชมรีเพลย์ของเหล่าผู้เล่นมากฝีมือ และอื่น ๆ อีกมากมาย

description.hltext_display: Юлию Тимошенко снова вызывают на допрос
description.content:
20 декабря генеральная прокуратура предъявила Тимошенко обвинения по делу о нецелевом использовании средств, полученных от продаж квот на выбросы парниковых газов в рамках Киотского протокола. Согласно постановлению прокуратуры, Юлия Тимошенко, занимая должность премьера, действуя умышленно и руководствуясь личными интересами, решила единолично принять решение относительно использования части средств, поступивших от продажи квот на выбросы парниковых газов, на покрытие расходов госбюджета по выплате пенсий.
Эти средства были получены Украиной после того, как в марте 2009 года Украина договорилась о продаже Японии 30 миллионов единиц установленного количества выбросов парниковых газов. В апреле Тимошенко подтвердила, что правительство Украины получило 3 миллиарда гривен (375 миллионов долларов) от этой продажи.
Сама Тимошенко считает, что с помощью уголовного дела о нецелевом использовании бюджетных средств действующая власть пытается расправиться со своим главным политическим конкурентом. "Всё это действительно напоминает абсурд, - говорит она. - Я выплачивала пенсии людям, но это по закону Украины не является преступлением". С Тимошенко была взята . Юлию Тимошенко снова следователи Генпрокуратуры Украины. Ранее ей были предъявлены обвинения в нецелевом использовании средств, полученных от продаж квот на выбросы парниковых газов в рамках Киотского протокола. Юлию Тимошенко снова следователи Генпрокуратуры Украины. Ранее ей были предъявлены обвинения в нецелевом использовании средств, полученных от продаж квот на выбросы парниковых газов в рамках Киотского протокола. Юлию Тимошенко снова следователи Генпрокуратуры Украины. Ранее ей были предъявлены обвинения в нецелевом использовании средств, полученных от продаж квот на выбросы парниковых газов в рамках Киотского протокола. © Государственный интернет-канал "Россия" 2001 - 2010. description.hltext_display: SYNC AppLink Now Available as Free Download; Ford Fiesta Owners First With Voice Control of Apps
description.content:
DEARBORN, Mich.
More than 14,000 owners of SYNC -equipped Ford Fiesta vehicles can start celebrating the holidays now by treating themselves to the gift of AppLink, a free software program that gives SYNC users voice control of apps stored on their smartphone.
The industry-first capability puts Ford out front in the race to integrate smartphone apps into the car. The AppLink download for Fiesta owners went live today on the SYNC owner website, www.syncmyride.com. "More and more drivers are using their devices and their apps while in the car," said Doug VanDagens
Ford is also announcing a surprise new member to the AppLink family: the Apple iPhone. The popular smartphone makes for a powerful addition, and will be joining Android and BlackBerry smartphones as compatible devices with the software that allows apps to be controlled through the SYNC voice recognition system - a smarter alternative to manually controlling apps while driving.
Recent studies indicate 46 percent of adult smartphone users have apps on their phones and 36 percent of those admit to using those apps while commuting. Moreover, the 2010 study "Staying Connected on the Go: A Look at In-Vehicle Smartphone Integration Systems" conducted by the Consumer Electronics Association reports that 55 percent of smartphone owners prefer voice commands as their user interface for in-car smartphone integration, making the business case for SYNC and AppLink even more compelling. "SYNC and AppLink work hand-in-hand to answer consumer demand for safer, smarter control of smartphones while in the car," said VanDagens. "Ford has worked hard to be a step ahead or at least in step with the speed of the consumer electronics market, and to leverage the technologies, features and services we know our customers want to be connected to while driving." Easy downloading
2011 SYNC-equipped Ford Fiesta owners need to log in to their account on www.syncmyride.com to access the free AppLink download in the Update & Customize section.
As with any typical download, the AppLink software can be stored on a USB memory stick, and then inserted and uploaded to the vehicle via the SYNC system's USB port. In-car installation takes less than 10 minutes.
The first SYNC-enabled apps to market are Pandora internet radio, Stitcher news radio and OpenBeak for listening to Twitter posts. Once the AppLink upload is complete, customers can then visit their phones' respective app store to download the latest SYNC-enabled Pandora, Stitcher or OpenBeak app to their smartphone as they would any other app.
Current availability of SYNC-enabled apps:
Seamless voice control
AppLink makes the connection between app and SYNC fairly seamless and simple, using Bluetooth streaming on paired Android and BlackBerry smartphones and the USB port for a connected Apple iPhone.
To access a mobile app with a SYNC-paired phone, the user simply has to press the VOICE button on the steering wheel and say the command, "Mobile applications," followed by the name of the app he or she would like to launch.
Once linked to Pandora, SYNC users can access their favorite personalized radio features, including creating and choosing stations, bookmarking songs for purchase, and giving songs a thumbs up/down all through voice. Command structure is intuitive and simple: "Play station classic rock radio," "Bookmark song," "Thumbs up" or "Thumbs down." "Where before users would pick up their phone, taking their eyes off the road and hands off the steering wheel while driving to select a station and hit play, AppLink makes all of that functionality available through voice control, just like managing AM and FM radio or your MP3 player through SYNC," said Julius Marchwicki
Similar voice command pathways and functionality exist for the Stitcher and OpenBeak apps. With Stitcher, for example, you can say the command, "Play station news" to listen to your favorite news radio or "Play station sports" to hear on-demand sports programming. Other popular Stitcher features such as skip station, thumbs up/down and "Add to favorites" are also available via voice.
Through the OpenBeak app, drivers can simply say the SYNC command, "Read timeline." In seconds, their feed is read aloud using the SYNC text-to-speech engine - a very similar experience to listening to talk radio.
Additional SYNC-enabled apps and smartphone integrations are coming soon, said Marchwicki. AppLink will also be introduced on other SYNC-equipped new model vehicles in 2011.
Ford will feature demos of AppLink at the Pepcom Digital Experience media event in Las Vegas
About Ford Motor Company
Ford Motor Company (NYSE: F), a global automotive industry leader based in Dearborn, Mich., manufactures or distributes automobiles across six continents. With about 163,000 employees and about 70 plants worldwide, the company's automotive brands include Ford, Lincoln and Mercury, production of which has been announced by the company to be ending in the fourth quarter of 2010. The company provides financial services through Ford Motor Credit Company. For more information regarding Ford's products, please visit www.ford.com.
SOURCE Ford Motor Company

description.hltext_display: Biologisch voedsel betalen met ecocheques mag
description.content:
ADHESE IMU (in artikel) - 2K - NIET VERWIJDEREN
ADHESE TEXTLINK - NIET VERWIJDEREN
Alles over
BRUSSEL - Vanaf 1 januari is het toegestaan om ecocheques te gebruiken om biologische voeding te kopen.
Dat werd dinsdag beslist op de Nationale Arbeidsraad (NAR), zo meldt BioForum, de koepelorganisatie voor biologische landbouw en voeding. Het nieuws wordt bevestigd bij de liberale vakbond ACLVB, die vertegenwoordigers heeft in de NAR.
Voortaan kan dus ook voeding aangeschaft worden met de ecocheques. Voordien ging het enkel om biologische non food-producten, aldus BioForum.
Het ACLVB meldt ook dat andere items aan de lijst toegevoegd werden van de producten die in aanmerking komen voor de ecocheque. Het gaat onder meer om elektrische scooters en verplaatsingen met een autocar.
De ecocheques zijn het resultaat van het interprofessioneel overleg van 2008 voor de periode 20009-2010. Het gaat om een nettoloonsverhoging want de cheques zijn vrijgesteld van belastingen en sociale bijdragen. Met de cheques kunnen milieuvriendelijke producten gekocht worden.

description.hltext_display: 金马仑车祸4名泰国伤者回国治疗
description.content:
（怡保22日马新社讯）两天前在金马伦往新邦波赖15公里处严重车祸的受伤的10名泰国游客当中，其中4人今日出院回国。
合艾医院顾问朱威特指出，其中3人被救护车载往黑木山，其余1人则前往梳邦空军基地。

description.hltext_display: Muslim yang baik tidak akan Merusak Lingkungan
description.author: Sadly Rachman
description.content:
REPUBLIKA.CO.ID, JAKARTA--Kementerian Lingkungan Hidup mengharapkan pondok pesantren (Pontren) menjadi fondasi dasar tata kelola lingkungan tanah air. Sebab, pontren boleh dibilang institusi pendidikan agama yang berposisi strategis guna memberikan penyadaran kepada masyarakat melalui pendekatan keagamaan.
Deputi Kementerian Lingkungan Hidup Bidang Komunikasi Lingkungan dan Pemberdayaan Masyarakat, Ilyas Asaad menilai eco pontren, demikian nama program kementerian Lingkungan Hidup, merupakan program yang menjadikan pontren sebagai role model tata laksana lingkungan hidup melalui pengembangan pendidikan seperti penerapan konsep ideologi, dan penerapan.
Ketua Lembaga Pemuliaan Lingkungan Hidup Majelis Ulama Indonesia (MUI), Hayu S Prabowo mengatakan pontren bukanlah satu-satunya lembaga yang dilibatkan dalam penanggulangan masalah tata lingkungan tanah air. Meski begitu, pontren memang diharapkan menjadi role model strategis dalam pengembangan pendidikan berbasis lingkungan.
Ke depan, Menurut Hayu, pendidikan berbasis lingkungan dapat diterapkan tidak sebatas pontren saja melainkan pendidikan konvensional dan masyarakat umum yang melingkupi. Dengan demikian, permasalahan lingkungan hidup di Indonesia bisa teratasi secara sistematis dan komprehensif.
Program Eco Pontren telah berlangsung semenjak tahun 2002.Hingga kini tercatat ribuýan pontren yang berada dalam sejumlah region seperti Sumatera, Jawa, Bali, Kalimantan, Nusa Tenggara, Sulawesi, dan Papua.Pusat lokasi program berada di Jogyakarta.

description.hltext_display: Чемпионский Хук
description.content:
До этого Денис победил во всех боях (21, их них 16 нокаутом). Но и это поражение стало неоднозначным. Не считаю себя проигравшим, отметил сразу после боя Лебедев. Был уверен, что выигрываю, и, возможно, из-за этого не так активно провел заключительные раунды.
Что ж, давно известно дома и судьи помогают. Особенно в боях с немецкими боксерами. Достаточно вспомнить поединок петербуржца Романа Кармазина с Себастьяном Сильвестром, который проходил летом этого года и завершился ничейным исходом, после того как один из рефери изменил свое мнение. Так что Денис должен был знать: только явное преимущество обеспечит ему чемпионский пояс.
Бесспорного перевеса не было, поединок выдался очень напряженным. Со стороны казалось, что россиянин был точнее в атаках, неплохо защищался. У Хука не проходили ни хуки, ни апперкоты, но таково было решение судей.
Денис Лебедев является опытным боксером. Только на любительском ринге он провел более двухсот боев, был призером Игр доброй воли в 1998 году. После перехода в профессионалы выиграл двенадцать боев, но затем решил сделать паузу. Появилась семья, ребенок, говорит Денис Лебедев. И надо было подумать о них. Потом, в 2008 году, после встречи и беседы с Александром Поветкиным решил вернуться на ринг.
Второй приход Дениса тоже оказался удачным. Одержав ряд побед, он стал обязательным претендентом. Но теперь, после поражения от Хука, ему надо будет вновь доказать свое право на титульный бой.В Берлине обязательный претендент на титул чемпиона мира по версии Всемирной боксерской организации (ВБО) в первом тяжелом весе (90,72) россиянин Денис Лебедев в 12-раундовом поединке уступил чемпиону мира немцу Марко Хуку. Мнения судей разошлись: двое отдали победу Хуку 115:113, 115:113, один Лебедеву 116:112

description.hltext_display: Snow sees festive footfall plummet
description.content: Heavy snow kept shoppers indoors on Saturday, the last before Christmas, with footfall dropping by nearly a quarter year-on-year.

description.hltext_display: Junger Mann verschwunden
description.content: Seit Anfang Dezember ist ein junger Mann aus Grafenwöhr (Landkreis Neustadt/Waldnaab) verschwunden - noch immer hat die Polizei keine heiße Spur. Der 20-Jährige war zuletzt am 4. Dezember auf dem Parkplatz einer Diskothek in Trockau (Landkreis Bayreuth) gesehen worden. Man ermittle weiter auf Hochtouren, teilte die Polizei in Bayreuth mit. Inzwischen habe sich eine Zeugin gemeldet, die die Brille des Vermissten auf einem Stehtisch im Raucherbereich vor der Diskothek gefunden und beim Wirt abgegeben hatte. Die Beamten suchen nun nach weiteren Zeugen, die beobachtet haben, wer die Brille dort abgelegt hat. dpa

description.hltext_display: FTA awards $20M for motorcoach accessibility
description.content:
Enter the verification code as it is shown below without spaces. (Case-insensitive)
Enter Code:
Image Code Verification
Automated programs can't "read" the code you see in the box: only humans can. When you enter this code, it ensures that your order is going to a real person.
If you don't see an image, make sure your browser is set to display images and try again. If you're not sure what the code is, make your best guess. If you're incorrect, you'll get another chance to enter a different code on the next screen.
Last week, U.S. Transportation Secretary Ray LaHood announced that 128 intercity and tour bus lines will share in a total of $20 million to help meet the 2012 federal deadline for making motorcoaches accessible to riders using wheelchairs and other mobility devices. The money comes from the Federal Transit Administration's (FTA) Over-the-Road Bus Program.
"Most of us don't think twice about the simple act of getting on a bus," said U.S. Transportation Secretary Ray LaHood. "Yet for millions who use mobility devices for independence such as wheelchairs, a broken or non-existent lift can interrupt a commute to work or cause someone to miss a visit with friends or family. This investment will ensure greater mobility for all."
While the majority of awardees received under $100,000 for one or two wheelchair lifts, Greyhound of Dallas, which has a fleet of more than 1,200 coaches, will receive $5.3 million to purchase 146 lifts. Funds will also be used to train bus line personnel in the proper operation and maintenance of the lifts, boarding assistance, securing wheelchairs and other related functions.
"Public transportation, including intercity and tour bus service, should be available to everyone who wants to use it," said FTA Administrator Peter Rogoff. "This important investment will help ensure that happens."
First authorized under the Transportation Equity Act for the 21st Century in 1998, the Over the Road Bus Program makes federal funding available for bus lines to accommodate people with disabilities by adding lifts and other accessibility components to new vehicles and by retrofitting existing vehicles.
To view a complete list of bus lines receiving Over the Road Bus grants, click here.

description.hltext_display: Förbundshemsida hackad - upprörda efter avstängning
description.author: TT expressen@expressen.se
description.content: Internationella taekwondoförbundets hemsida attackerades av hackare som var upprörda efter att taiwanesiskan Yang Shu-chun straffats med avstängning efter att ha haft för många sensorer i strumporna under Asiatiska spelen.

description.hltext_display: Haushaltsplan 2011 verabschiedet: Spanien darf mit dem Sparen anfangen
description.content:
HB MADRID. Das spanische Parlament hat den Weg für drastische Sparmaßnahmen freigemacht. Mit knapper Mehrheit nahmen die Abgeordneten den Budgetentwurf der Regierung an, der eine deutliche Reduzierung der Staatsausgaben vorsieht. 177 Abgeordnete stimmten für das Sparpaket - einer mehr, als für die Verabschiedung nötig war. 171 Parlamentarier lehnten es ab.
Die Regierung von Ministerpräsident José Luis Rodriguez Zapatero brauchte die Unterstützung selbst kommt im Abgeordnetenhaus nur auf 169 Sitze und brauchte deswegen die Unterstützung zweier kleinerer Parteien. Wirtschaftsministerin Elena Salgado zeigte sich nach der Abstimmung erleichert und bezeichnete das Sparpaket als wichtiges Instrument, um den Schritt von der Krise zum wirtschaftlichen Wachstum zu schaffen.
Durch den gekürtzen Haushalt soll das Defizit des hoch verschuldeten Landes um mehr als drei Prozentpunkte auf sechs Prozent des Bruttoinlandsprodukts gesenkt und die Finanzmärkte beruhigt werden. Spanien gilt als einer der Kandidaten für den EU-Rettungsschirm.
Die Ratingagentur Moody's hatte Spanien zuletzt mit der Herabstufung der Bonitätsnote gedroht. Zur Begründung hatte sie unter anderem auf die Möglichkeit zusätzlicher Belastungen für den Staatshaushalt im Falle eines höheren Finanzbedarfs der spanischen Banken verwiesen.
Umso wichtiger war es für die regierenden Sozialisten, dass es die Etatpläne durch das Abgeordnetenhaus schafften. Diese enthalten unter anderem eine Kürzung der Ausgaben der einzelnen Ministerien um bis zu 16 Prozent vor. Die spanischen Beamten bekommen bereits seit Juni fünf Prozent weniger Gehalt. Um den angeschlagenen Haushalt zu sanieren, hat die Regierung Anfang Dezember zusätzliche Sparmaßnahmen angekündigt. So sollen beispielsweise Sonderhilfen für Arbeitslose nicht verlängert werden und im Februar auslaufen.

description.hltext_display: Gröhe: SPD soll "taktische Spielchen" beenden
description.content:
ver - Die SPD rechnet auch in der nächsten Runde der Hartz-IV-Verhandlungen nicht mit einem Durchbruch. Das Ziel der Partei sei, “das Beste für die Kinder rausholen“. Gröhe spricht von taktischen Spielchen.
© dpa
Gröhe wirft der SPD "taktische Spielchen" vor.
Die Bereitschaft, mehr für die Bildung zu tun, sei sehr unterschiedlich ausgeprägt, sagte Parteivize Manuela Schwesig. Die SPD-Verhandlungsführerin bekräftigte, dass der Bildungsbereich für die SPD besonders wichtig sei. “Ich akzeptiere es nicht, bei den Kindern zu sagen, dafür haben wir kein Geld, während vorher bei den Banken immer Geld vorhanden war.“ Das Gegenteil sei richtig, unterstrich die mecklenburgische Gesundheitsministerin und warnte vor drastisch steigenden Sozialkosten. Investitionen in die Bildung seien eine Frage der sozialen Gerechtigkeit und der ökonomischen Vernunft. “Mangelnde Bildung führt zu geringeren Beschäftigungschancen und zu schlechteren Wettbewerbschancen in der globalen Wirtschaft.“ Die SPD fühle sich dafür verantwortlich, “für die Kinder in diesem Vermittlungsverfahren das Beste rauszuholen.“
Die SPD-Politikerin deutete in anderen Fragen hingegen Kompromissbereitschaft an. “Beim Mindestlohn gibt es nicht nur Ja oder Nein, aber ich erwarte, dass wir in der Sache wirklich vorankommen.“
Gröhe: SPD soll “taktische Spielchen“ beenden
Unterdessen hat CDU-Generalsekretär Hermann Gröhe die SPD aufgefordert, ihre “taktische Spielchen“ bei den Verhandlungen zu beenden. “Sachfremde Forderungen wie der gesetzliche Mindestlohn verzögern eine Einigung nur unnötig“, sagte Gröhe. Wer die Neuregelung der Hartz-IV-Leistungen und das damit verbundene Bildungspaket mit derartigen Bedingungen verknüpfe, nehme die Kinder der Langzeitarbeitslosen als Geiseln. “Spätestens wenn die Schule losgeht, muss die Richtung klar sein“, verlangte der CDU-Politiker.
Am Dienstag war die vom Vermittlungsausschuss eingesetzte Arbeitsgruppe zu ihrer zweiten Gesprächsrunde zusammengekommen. Vor Beginn hatten Sozialdemokraten und Grüne ihre Forderung nach höheren Regelsätzen für Hartz-IV-Empfänger, flächendeckenden Mindestlöhnen und einer Überarbeitung des Bildungspakets bekräftigt. Union und FDP wollen den am vergangenen Freitag im Bundesrat gescheiterten Gesetzesentwurf dagegen zügig und mit möglichst wenigen Änderungen verabschieden.

description.hltext_display: 위키리크스 "북한정권 종식되도록 지원 중단해야"
description.content:
호주, 미국에 대북지원 중단요청
[ⓒ '글로벌 석간 종합일간지' 아시아투데이]
[아시아투데이=홍경환 기자] 호주 연방정부가 미국에 북한에 대한 지원을 중단해 북한이 붕괴하도록 해야 한다고 촉구한 것으로 밝혀졌다.
폭로 전문 웹사이트 위키리크스가 최근 공개한 호주주재 미대사관의 외교전문에 따르면 존 하워드 전 총리 재임 당시 알렉산더 다우너 외교통상부 장관은 2005년 2월 16일 캔버라에서 열린 한 회담에서 리언 러포트 당시 주한미군사령관에게 “북한 독재정권이 종식되도록 국제사회는 북한에 대한 지원을 중단해야 한다”고 촉구했다고 언론들이 22일 전했다.
당시 미국은 한국 주한미군 감축을 진행 중이었고 북한은 그해 2월 핵보유를 발표했다.
러포트 사령관은 다우너 장관이 북한의 군사력이 서울을 공격할 수 있는 능력이 있는지 묻자 “북한은 고성능 폭탄과 화학 무기를 탑재할 수 있는 250문의 대포를 보유하고 있다”면서 “동시에 북한의 장거리 미사일은 한국은 물론 일본까지 도달할 수 있다”고 답변했다. 그러면서 “북한의 대포가 낡기는 했지만 여전히 가장 위협적인 존재가 되고 있다”고 덧붙였다.
러포트는 하지만 “120만명의 병력을 보유하고 있는 북한이 전쟁에서 승리할 수 있는지는 미지수”라며 “북한의 공군력과 해군력은 제한적이며 군수물자 공급 능력 등도 떨어진다”고 설명했다.
{ⓒ '글로벌 석간 종합일간지' 아시아투데이}

description.hltext_display: 启明信息：十年耕耘成国内汽车电子龙头
description.content:
关键字：汽车电子
现代汽车电子技术是汽车发展的重要标志，汽车电子化被认为是汽车技术发展进程中的一次革命，是用来开发新车型，改进汽车性能最为重要的技术措施。随着汽车机械性能逐渐稳定难以进一步提高，汽车电子成为汽车技术进步的最重要标志。在国外，电子系统已经可以占据一辆豪华轿车生产成本的70%，普通轿车成本的30%。预计到2015年，我国汽车电子及电子技术相关产品在整车成本中所占的比例将从目前的15%左右上升到30%。未来随着我国汽车产量继续保持稳定增长的态势，以及汽车电子产品在整车中的重要性提升，我们预计汽车电子产业市场规模将持续快速增长，到2015年有望实现产值4,100亿元人民币，这将极大的促进我国汽车电子产业的发展。我们重点关注汽车电子龙头：启明信息。
公司主营业务包括汽车电子、管理软件、系统集成和数据中心系统集成和硬件销售业务，在总营业收入中所占比重依然较高，2010年上半年占68%左右，但是主营业务利润贡献仅仅有28%。公司已经成立了长春启明信息集成服务技术有限公司，将所有系统集成业务整合进入这一新成立的全资子公司内。公司的这一战略性举措有助于公司将主要精力聚焦至盈利前景乐观的汽车电子和软件服务业务，公司未来的战略重点将是汽车电子和汽车业软件。
作为一汽集团下属企业，公司的发展与集团的发展以及集团对于公司的定位息息相关。在十二五规划中，集团对公司的定位由此前的“衍生经济”提升为“核心支撑体系”，意味着公司在未来将得到集团更多的支持与倾斜政策，其业务将获得更大发展空间。公司将在汽车电子研发与生产以及汽车IT建设方面给予集团有力的支撑，这些业务也将成为公司未来发展的核心动力。
公司在车载电子方面已进行了长达十年左右的耕耘，在汽车前装车载信息系统领域建立了明显的竞争优势，是目前国内唯一一家可以提供总线级别产品的厂商，可以为一汽轿车奔腾和大众PQ35、PQ46系列车型进行配套。我们认为，在车联网逐步走向现实应用的背景下，公司前装/准前装产品相对于其他厂商后装产品的功能优势将得到充分体现，有望逐步成为市场主流产品，从而给公司带来爆发式增长的机遇。公司目前已开始进行准前装产品的销售试点，看好相关产品的销售前景。

description.hltext_display: Un tema Unico
description.content: La localía en 2011 es todo un tema. Mientras los dirigentes planean una reunión con autoridades provinciales para conocer cuándo estará disponible el Estadio Ciudad de La Plata y así poder poner a la venta los abonos y los estacionamientos, Juan Sebastián Verón recorrió ayer las instalaciones del Unico en compañía de Daniel Scioli. La reinauguración planeada para el 19 de diciembre quedó postergada por demoras en la colocación del techo y la nueva fecha sería el 17/1. Si así fuera no habría problemas para que el equipo de Sabella juegue Clausura y Copa en 25 y 32. Hasta ahora, lo único confirmado es la presencia de U2 el 30 de marzo y el 2 de abril.

description.hltext_display: Biogen Idec, Elan Submit Applications To Update TYSABRI Labeling - Update
description.content:
(RTTNews) - Biotechnology companies Biogen Idec Inc. (BIIB: News ) and Elan Corp. plc (ELN: News ) said Wednesday that they submitted applications to request review and approval to update Tysabri labeling that may help stratify risk of PML with anti-JC virus antibody status.
The companies, which co-market Tysabri, submitted a supplemental Biologics License Application, or sBLA, to the U.S. Food and Drug Administration or FDA, and a Type II Variation to the European Medicines Agency or EMA. With these applications, Biogen Idec and Elan requests to update the respective TYSABRI Prescribing Information and Summary of Product Characteristics.
The companies are proposing updated product labeling to include anti-JC Virus antibody status as one potential factor to help stratify the risk of progressive multifocal leukoencephalopathy, or PML, a rare but serious brain infection, in the Tysabri-treated population.
These filings are part of the their ongoing commitment to actively identify and address potential risk factors for PML in Tysabri-treated patients.
Tysabri is a prescription medicine approved for adult patients with relapsing forms of multiple sclerosis, or MS, to slow the worsening of disability that is common in patients with MS and decrease the number of flare-ups. The drug is approved in more than 45 countries. In the U.S., it is approved for relapsing forms of MS and in the European Union for relapsing-remitting MS.
BIIB closed Tuesday's regular trading session at $68.22, up $0.24, on a volume of 1.04 million shares.
ELN settled at $5.94 on Tuesday, up $0.02 on 978,000 shares.
To receive FREE breaking news email alerts for Biogen Idec and others in your portfolio
by RTT Staff Writer
For comments and feedback: contact editorial@rttnews.com

description.hltext_display: Series of Reports Blacken Oil Sands Managers
description.content:
Syncrude oil sands complex north of Fort McMurray. Photo by David Dodge, The Pembina Institute.
Why did a parliamentary committee suddenly destroy drafts of a final report on tar sands pollution? Here's what they knew.
What the scientists got right, and missed, in their high-profile, largely damning report.
Potential buyers of tar sands oil want to know its true carbon footprint, but industry won't come clean.
NIKIFORUK SOUNDED ALARMS THAT REPORTS NOW VERIFY
When Andrew Nikiforuk signed on to be The Tyee's writer in residence, he had his work cut out for him, as he saw it. His own research for his award-winning book Tar Sands: Dirty Oil and the Future of a Continent had told him that the Alberta oil sands were being mined with dangerously inadequate regard for water quality and other toxic effects.
His first article as writer-in-residence for The Tyee, "What Those Who Killed the Tar Sands Report Don't Want You to Know" painstakingly resurrected the testimony and scientific findings pointing to an environmental disaster in the making that the Harper government tried to bury. That was published on July 15, 2010, and it was one of The Tyee's most read pieces of the year.
In the past two months, the spate of independent reports validating Nikiforuk's reporting for The Tyee are gratifying to see. You can find all of Nikiforuk's pieces for The Tyee here. -- David Beers
"We do not err because truth is difficult to see. It is visible at a glance. We err because this is more comfortable." -- Alexander Solzhenitsyn
It's been a mirthless month of truth and consequences for the tar sands, the world's largest energy project, and its careless government servants.
Environment Canada's Oilsands Advisory Panel, the Royal Society of Canada and Ottawa's commissioner of the environment all took a hard look at the quality of water monitoring on the mighty Athabasca River and declared the obvious: that it was disorganized, incoherent, third rate, and lacked scientific leadership. In short, it was neither credible nor ethical.
These ugly truths, long evident to aboriginal elders and many scientists, have sent industry propagandists and government falsifiers back to their rooms for a long Christmas sulk. Yes, Virginia, there is a hell for liars.
Alberta's incompetent environment minister, Rob Renner, can no longer say all pollution on the Athabasca River is as natural as Santa Claus. And Premier Ed Stelmach, Canada's Daft Bitumen Monarch, can no longer carol about "environmental responsibility" or the sweetness of the air in Fort McMurray.
Moreover, the Canadian Association of Petroleum Producers will have to remove a sentence in their glossy 2010 brochure that says "Canada's oil sands industry operates within some of the most stringent and comprehensive regulations for resource development anywhere in the world." It's simply a crude fabrication.
And members of Alberta Health, Health Canada and the Soviet-minded Alberta College of Physicians and Surgeons can no longer get away with accusing a good doctor of causing "undue alarm" because the real truth is indeed alarming.
Catching up with top scientists
And here's why. After two peer-reviewed studies by Erin Kelly and David Schindler in 2009 and 2010 documented that bitumen production contaminated the Athabasca River with heavy metals and cancer-makers, Ottawa reluctantly appointed an Oilsands Advisory Panel last October to review and assess the adequacy of scientific monitoring downstream of the open pit mines and natural gas guzzling steam plants. The panel consisted of some of Canada's finest scientists including John Smol, Peter Dillon and Andrew Miall.
After documenting a plethora of organizations and groups working in an ad hoc way with little or no direction on water monitoring, the panel came to six damning conclusions:
1. A holistic monitoring program with clear set of objectives and "statistically sound decision making process that can allow for adaptive management in rapidly changing oil sands environment does not exist."
2. The industry funded Regional Aquatic Monitoring Program (RAMP) suffers from a lack of leadership, is not effects based, and "is not producing world-class scientific output in a transparent, peer reviewed format and it is not adequately communicating its results to the scientific community or the public."
3. The level of monitoring and research activity in the oil sands is "dwarfed," by the scientific effort summoned to deal with acid rain in eastern Canada in the 1980s.
4. Baseline data on predevelopment water conditions is not only poor but development is proceeding so quickly that it is actually destroying water sampling locations designed to establish what an undisturbed area looks like.
5. Climate change and rapid development have yet to catalyze "thinking and action" in government circles.
6. Until these shortcomings are addressed, "there will continue to be uncertainty and public distrust in the environmental performance of the oil sands industry and government oversight."
The final nail
Now add these sobering conclusions to the truths unearthed by Scott Vaughan, commissioner of the Environment and Sustainable Development. They appeared in a disturbing 2010 fall report released in the first week of December. As an auditor (and journalists love these integrity brokers), Vaughan can't publish anything unless it's 100 per cent verifiable.
He disclosed that Environment Canada identified toxic pollutants such as heavy metals and polycyclic aromatic hydrocarbons (many are cancer makers) from the tar sands as potential threats to water quality as early as 2001.
Now, just one of the government's 456 national water quality stations sits 150 kilometres downstream of the mega-project. But as of June 2010 "it didn't have the capability to monitor many of the toxic pollutants associated with the oil sands production," Vaughan later explained to an audience at the Program On Water Issues at the University of Toronto's Munk Centre.
Vaughan's report also identified water neglect as a sort of demonic national pastime. Environment Canada, for example, has insufficient data to monitor Lake Winnipeg pollution and "insufficient data" to "monitor threats related to population growth and economic development." And "insufficient data" for the oil sands, too. How Third World is that?
Given that the federal government has chosen not to stand on guard for fish or First Nations downstream from 91 oil sands projects, it should come as no surprise that 61 pe rcent of the nation's water stations scandalously report "sub optimal water quality." Most developed countries would regard such callus disregard for water as outright criminal activity.
Thumbs down from the Royal Society
Last comes the flawed Royal Society of Canada report on the environmental impacts of the industry. Although incomplete and often inaccurate (it was a volunteer effort), the report gave a resounding thumbs down to regulatory performance in the tar sands: "It does not appear to have kept pace with the rapid growth of the oil sands industry over the past decade" and has "severe deficiencies."
The Royal Society also noted that the Alberta government gives away water to oil companies for "a price of zero." As a result "incentives for water conservation" let alone technological improvements "will be less effective under current arrangements than if water were priced at levels closer to its opportunity cost."
None of these findings will shock Americans, our observant bitumen buyers. Unlike certain Canadians, our U.S. cousins recognize liars when they hear them. In a 2009 oil sands report by the non-partisan Council on Foreign Relations, author Michael Levi accurately described the Progressive Conservative Party of Alberta, an oily entity in power since 1971, as "skeptical of environmental regulation."
The consequences, of course, are as a black of as bitumen. In order to restore integrity and credibility, the government needs an independent scientific panel with representation from people downwind (Saskatchewan) and the folks downstream (the Northwest Territories and First Nations).
Water monitoring a must
As recommended by the Oilsands Advisory Panel, a shared national water-monitoring program for the project must also be comprehensive, adaptive, peer reviewed and transparent or everything the current mess is not.
Industry leaders such as Marcel Coutu of Syncrude and Bruce March of Imperial Oil must demand that this new monitoring program have the same panache and class as the Northern Rivers Basins Study, the Great Lakes Water Quality Program or the US Geological Survey National Water Quality Assessment Program. The executives should also recognize that such quality will slow down development and that such prudence is now in the nation's best economic and reputational interest.
Visionary leadership will be required too. That means that neither Renner nor Stelmach should have anything to do with the restoration of science and integrity on the Athabasca River. (Alberta's Tories have demonstrated that there is nothing in the world more dangerous than "sincere ignorance and conscientious stupidity.")
So the job of leadership should go to the critics and the truth seekers, Erin Kelly and David Schindler. These two water scientists braved calumny, insults and government attacks to defend Canada's least appreciated resource: water.
[Editor's Note: As per Tyee tradition in recent years, we've closed the comment section for the holidays. Thank you all for creating such a thoughtful, alive and insightful conversation this year. We look forward to more of the same in the next. To you and yours, a heartfelt happy holidays!]
Andrew Nikiforuk, the Tyee writer in residence, was one of the first reporters in the country to identify and document the failings of industry controlled water monitoring on the Athabasca River in his award-winning national best seller, Tar Sands: Dirty Oil and the Future of a Continent.

description.hltext_display: Y el Globo de Oro es para…
description.content:
La Asociación de la Prensa Extranjera de Hollywood anunció la semana pasada su lista de nominados a los Globos de Oro, los cuales se entregarán el próximo 16 de enero.
En el terreno de la televisión no hubo grandes sorpresas. En el rubro dramático, incluso, ninguna. Volvieron a las nominaciones las series que en los últimos años han acaparado todo tipo de premios: “Mad Men”, “Dexter” y “The Good Wife”. Y a éstas se unieron dos estrenos que también era de esperarse que aparecieran en la categoría a mejor serie de drama: “Boardwalk Empire” —la serie dirigida por Martin Scorsese sobre el contrabando de vino en EU, de HBO— y “The Walking Dead” —el estreno de Fox sobre muertos vivientes con una fuerte campaña publicitaria.
Aunque no es presunción (no debería serlo, pues significa que paso demasiado tiempo viendo televisión) me ha tocado ver las cinco series nominadas. Me encantaría (porque me fascina) que “Mad Men” se quedara de nueva cuenta con el galardón. Pero sé que la cuarta temporada ya no conquistó con la misma intensidad a la crítica (a mí sí). Si elimino esta opción del panorama, las cuatro restantes me salen debiendo para el premio de este año. Aún así (si fuera una clase de impositiva Reina de Corazones) le otorgaría el valioso Globo de Oro a “Boardwalk Empire”. Su estreno fue bueno y aunque el tema no es la creatividad andando, uno no puede negar que los genios del género gangster (Scorsese y Terence Winter) saben hacer su trabajo.
Steve Buscemi (quien protagoniza esta serie), además, es mi favorito para el galardón a mejor actor en una serie dramática. Se lo merece, por trayectoria y por su gran interpretación en “Boardwalk Empire”.
Y en el terreno de la comedia, ahí sí patino en mi pronóstico. Las contendientes (también sin grandes sorpresas) son “30 Rock”, “The Big Bang Theory”, “The Big C”, “Glee” (que lidera en número de nominaciones), “Modern Family” y “Nurse Jackie”.
Por lo pronto, aviso que mis predicciones no serán las más confiables puesto que nunca he visto “The Big C” ni “Nurse Jackie”. Pero más importante, porque confesaré que no soy seguidora de “Glee” y que incluso… ¡la detesto! (¡lo he dicho!). No es personal, más bien tengo la misma sensación repulsiva por los musicales en general, salvo algunas excepciones. Pero si a un musical le agregas los clichés más detestables de las universidades gringas (porristas, jugadores de americano, nerds y demás), el resultado no es algo que me llame la atención. Pero en fin, “Glee” probablemente será la ganadora (o “Modern Family”). Mientras que yo, como simple fanática, le daría el Globo a “The Big Bang Theory”.

description.hltext_display: Junge stirbt in eigenem Iglu
description.content:
Ein 14-Jähriger ist am Montag beim Bau eines Iglus in Steinbach-Hallenberg (Landkreis Schmalkalden-Meiningen) ums Leben gekommen.
Der Junge wurde beim Einsturz der zwei Meter hohen Schneehütte unter den Schneemassen begraben, wie die Polizeidirektion am Dienstag mitteilte. Er hatte das Iglu seit mehreren Tagen gebaut. Nachdem der Großvater seinen Enkel fand, wurde der 14-Jährige reanimiert und ins Krankenhaus eingeliefert. Dort verstarb der Schüler am Abend. Die Ermittlungen zur genauen Todesursache dauern an. Die Familie des Jugendlichen und seine Schulklasse werden durch Seelsorger betreut. dapd

description.hltext_display: Biogen Idec, Elan Submit Applications To Update TYSABRI Labeling - Update
description.content:
(RTTNews) - Biotechnology companies Biogen Idec Inc. (BIIB: News ) and Elan Corp. plc (ELN: News ) said Wednesday that they submitted applications to request review and approval to update Tysabri labeling that may help stratify risk of PML with anti-JC virus antibody status.
The companies, which co-market Tysabri, submitted a supplemental Biologics License Application, or sBLA, to the U.S. Food and Drug Administration or FDA, and a Type II Variation to the European Medicines Agency or EMA. With these applications, Biogen Idec and Elan requests to update the respective TYSABRI Prescribing Information and Summary of Product Characteristics.
The companies are proposing updated product labeling to include anti-JC Virus antibody status as one potential factor to help stratify the risk of progressive multifocal leukoencephalopathy, or PML, a rare but serious brain infection, in the Tysabri-treated population.
These filings are part of the their ongoing commitment to actively identify and address potential risk factors for PML in Tysabri-treated patients.
Tysabri is a prescription medicine approved for adult patients with relapsing forms of multiple sclerosis, or MS, to slow the worsening of disability that is common in patients with MS and decrease the number of flare-ups. The drug is approved in more than 45 countries. In the U.S., it is approved for relapsing forms of MS and in the European Union for relapsing-remitting MS.
BIIB closed Tuesday's regular trading session at $68.22, up $0.24, on a volume of 1.04 million shares.
ELN settled at $5.94 on Tuesday, up $0.02 on 978,000 shares.
To receive FREE breaking news email alerts for Biogen Idec and others in your portfolio
by RTT Staff Writer
For comments and feedback: contact editorial@rttnews.com

description.hltext_display: S.F. repeat offenders, citations target of plan
description.author: Lea Suzuki / The Chronicle
description.content:
Supervisor Bevan Dufty asked for the report on homeless citations.
The quality of life on San Francisco's streets might finally start to improve.
After decades of confusion and dysfunction, the city's police, sheriff, district attorney, courts and mayor's office are crafting a plan to track, prosecute and get services for the persistent offenders who rack up dozens of citations and blithely ignore them. For the past six months, this column has focused on how a small group of bad actors - primarily chronic inebriates - drain city resources, distract law enforcement officials and frustrate residents who can't understand why someone can be cited repeatedly for the same offense but never seem to face any consequences nor get the help they need. A working group was formed to improve how these citations are handled, and a city controller's report released Tuesday should provide the framework needed to make for real change.
"This has been an urban legend for 20 years," said Supervisor Bevan Dufty, who commissioned a report on citations from the controller's office after reading about the problems highlighted in The Chronicle. "There is no reason why we can't correct this byzantine, dysfunctional, outmoded method of handling citations."
The controller's report reinforced what critics have been saying for the past six months. It found that almost half of all quality of life citations are dismissed in traffic court - three times the rate of other citations.
"What we've been doing is shuffling paper," said Cristine DeBerry, the mayor's deputy chief of staff, who is part of the working group. "We're spending an inordinate amount of money issuing citations and nothing happens. We need to either stop writing them, or mean it when we do."
There isn't any question what the majority of San Franciscans would choose. The city's urine-soaked streets, aggressive panhandlers and sidewalk campers have appalled tourists and neighborhood residents for years.
But the real key is that a relatively small number of chronic offenders - DeBerry thinks it may be as few as 50 to 100 - are generating a disproportionate number of citations. Those chronic offenders - and they are almost all male - are neither getting the treatment they need nor the nudge from law enforcement to stop breaking the law.
Police, prosecutors and courts are now targeting chronic offenders with 20 or more court warrants.
"These guys fall through the cracks," said Capt. Joe Garrity of the Tenderloin Station. "Everybody knows they need to get into services, but cops feel like they are spinning their wheels."
A new database is being created to allow officers and prosecutors to view a person's complete criminal history. This will help police and prosecutors identify people with multiple warrants.
The Sheriff's Department has also agreed to hold people with 20 or more warrants. Typically when someone with an outstanding warrant is brought to the jail, he is given a citation and notice to appear in court and sent on his way.
No one expects to lock up these defendants and throw away the key. Almost all of them have addiction or mental health problems. The idea is to get them into a program like the Community Justice Center.
Cases there are typically handled in a matter of days, compared with the 291 days it could take to get to trial in traffic court. The judge typically orders services that try to get to the root of the problem instead of simply sending someone to jail or prison.
A CJC model could also address another problem endemic to the current process. Defendants often have their infractions dismissed in traffic court when they produce a letter from a service provider stating that they are participating in an accepted plan. But, as the controller's report says, there is no follow-up to verify that the letters are valid or that the defendants complete the services.

event_or_fact.property: These guys fall through the cracks; Everybody knows they need to get into services, but cops feel like they are spinning their wheels.
This has been an urban legend for 20 years; There is no reason why we can't correct this byzantine, dysfunctional, outmoded method of handling citations.
What we've been doing is shuffling paper; We're spending an inordinate amount of money issuing citations and nothing happens. We need to either stop writing them, or mean it when we do.

description.hltext_display: 第四屆台灣工藝之家 陳慧芬、林時植分獲殊榮
description.content:
第4屆台灣工藝之家徵選活名單正式出爐，新竹市由專事木雕佛像彩繪及漆藝創作的陳慧芬老師，以及陶藝雕塑家林時植老師通過授證，授證儀式23日上午於國立臺灣工藝研究發展中心舉行。
本屆「臺灣工藝之家」遴選，全國共計有170位工藝家參加徵選，入選有20位，新竹市2位獲選。市府表示，「台灣工藝之家」是各縣市歷年推薦選拔出的優秀工藝家，工作室開放民眾參觀，讓民眾貼近藝術家的創作過程，以推廣藝術生活化，啟發文化創意產業及發展，將可帶動地方觀光。
文化局長林榮洲表示，新竹市每屆提報各領域工藝創作家參加角逐「台灣工藝之家」，在眾多優秀競技下，目前已有黃安福、李文福、許源榮、林啟燦、許金烺、蕭在淦、葉佳讓、蔡楊吉、葉佐燁等9位包括玻璃、木雕、陶藝、花燈等不同領域藝術家，連同新獲選的陳慧芬、林時植二位老師，共計有十一位。
陳慧芬老師專長木雕佛像彩繪及漆藝創作，藝術創作生涯近30年，作品特色在不斷追求創新與突破下，由傳統神像雕刻逐漸走向現代雕刻，工作室位於高峰路386巷85弄27號，電話03-5242495。
林時植老師，從事立體陶藝雕塑及複合媒材創作，年輕優秀，是現任新竹市美術協會理事，作品曾獲南瀛美展首獎、新竹美展首獎，在全國性各項美術比賽中屢獲大獎，他將父親的鐵工廠蛻變成文創工作室，作品為各界肯定。工作室位於中華路三段120號，電話03-5282375。受證掛牌後，歡迎有興趣的民眾預約參訪，體驗藝術家的創作過程與傳統藝術之美。

description.hltext_display: Pressestimme: 'Frankfurter Rundschau' zu Niedergang der FDP
US teen birth rate hits low in 2009
description.content:
Economy, awareness credited for decline
Type Size A A A
Next Page
1
| 2
Previous Page
ATLANTA -- The U.S. teen birth rate hit an all-time low in 2009 -- a decline that stunned experts say is partly because of the economy.
The birth rate for teenagers fell to 39 births per 1,000 girls ages 15 through 19, according to a government report released Tuesday. It was a 6 percent decline from the previous year, and the lowest rate since health officials started tracking it in 1940.
Experts say the recent recession -- from December 2007 to June 2009 -- was a major factor driving down births overall and there's good reason to think it affected would-be teen mothers. The economy also is considered a factor as to why the teen birth rate has declined in Delaware, said Jane Bowen, program manager for Children and Families First's adolescent resource center. The center provides education on pregnancy and sexual activity to students in grades 5-12 in New Castle and Kent counties.
"People are realizing more and more how hard teen pregnancy really is," she said. "The economy has emphasized that. This is a very hard economy, harder than we've had in 70 years."
Because of Delaware's small population, the state Division of Public Health uses five-year averages in determining its average teen birth rate. The latest data for the First State come from the years 2004 through 2008, in which the teen birth rate was 43.1 births per 1,000 girls, according to the Delaware Vital Statistics Annual Report from 2008.
The rate has steadily fallen during the past two decades. From the years 1990 through 1994, for example, the rate in Delaware was 56.5 births per 1,000 girls. But during the past decade the local rate has each year been higher than the national average.
Bowen said other factors have also helped the rate in Delaware decline during the past several years.
"Young people are getting more information now and they're not just reliant on parents and schools, but the media is talking more about this subject," Bowen said. "There's just more of an effort all the way around."
Locally, the teen birth rate is highest in Sussex County, at 60.3. In New Castle County, the rate is lowest at 37.7. In the city of Wilmington, the teen birth rate is 86.

The economy also is considered a factor as to why the teen birth rate has declined in Delaware
People are realizing more and more how hard teen pregnancy really is; The economy has emphasized that. This is a very hard economy, harder than we've had in 70 years.

description.hltext_display: Millicom, Helios strike new tower outsourcing deal
description.content:
STOCKHOLM, Dec 22 (Reuters) - Emerging markets telecoms group Millicom said its subsidiary in the Democratic Republic of the Congo had agreed to sell 729 towers for at least $45 million of cash up front to Helios Towers.
Millicom said in a statement it was its third such deal to outsource its telecoms towers in Africa to Helios after similar agreements in Ghana and Tanzania. It said nearly two-thirds of its towers in Africa were committed to be outsourced.
"The transaction is expected to create savings in both capital and operating expenditure for Tigo DRC," Millicom added, referring to its subsidiary in the Democratic Republic of Congo.
Tigo and Helios have also entered into a long-term leasing agreement to give Tigo access to wireless communications towers and a build-to-suit agreement for its wireless networks.
The aim of the outsourcing is to allow wireless operators to focus capital and management resources on higher quality service and be more cost-effective.
Helios Towers has funding from private equity group Helios Investment Partners, Soros Strategic Partners and RIT Capital Partners. (Reporting by Patrick Lannin; Editing by Jon Loades-Carter)

description.hltext_display: Первый миллион
description.author: Retailer.Ru
description.content:
22 Декабря 2010, 11:29 РБК daily Виталий Петлевой
власть и ритейл, финансы, Магазины аудио-видео продукции, Бытовая техника и электроника, LG, Nokia, Сотовый ритейл, Samsung
За два месяца действия закона о выплате вознаграждений в размере 1% в пользу правообладателей на счета Российского союза правообладателей (РСП) был переведен 1 млн долл. Учредитель союза Никита Михалков продолжает рассылать вендорам письма с требованиями начать переводить средства. Первыми, кто согласился платить союзу, стали компании Sony, Canon, Fujifilm и Casio.
Как сообщил РБК daily источник, знакомый с работой РСП, за первые два месяца действия закона «О вознаграждении за свободное воспроизведение фонограмм и аудиовизуальных произведений в личных целях» (с 14 октября 2010 года) на счета союза правообладателей поступило более 1 млн долл. РСП заработал свой первый миллион на отчислениях крупных компаний 1% стоимости с их реализованной продукции. Вендоры перечисляют плату с каждой единицы техники со своих банковских счетов на счет Российского союза правообладателей. В число облагаемых налогом мультимедийных устройств вошли видеокамеры, мобильные и стационарные телефоны, персональные компьютеры, ноутбуки, телевизоры, аудиопроигрыватели — любая техника, способная воспроизводить и копировать звуки и видеоряд.
Как рассказал РБК daily директор Российского союза правообладателей Андрей Кричевский, на данный момент многие ключевые вендоры и поставщики подписали с союзом правообладателей договоры «о выплате вознаграждений» в размере 1%. «Среди подписавших такие компании, как Canon, Sony, LogyCom, «Юнитрейд», Casio, I.S.P.A.-Engineering, JVC, Fujifilm, в ближайшее время готовятся подписать LG и Samsung. Компания Nokia согласовывает последние юридические вопросы с финским офисом и тоже скоро подпишет. Так что проблем особых нет», — говорит он. В компании Nokia факт переговоров подтвердили.

description.hltext_display: Под Харьковом сожгли более миллиона таблеток
description.content:
Самодельные стероиды для спортсменов отправили в печь.
Фоторепортажи
Видеогалереи
«Санта на продажу». ТРЕЙЛЕР
Стероиды, источник фото - www.medservic.ru
Сотрудники управления СБУ в Харьковской области вместе с работниками исполнительной службы и налоговой администрации «загрузили» в литейную печь промышленного предприятия 1 млн 200 тысяч самодельных стероидов, 20 тысяч флаконов с нандролоном (анаболик) и 15 килограммов сырья для их производства.
Фармакологический «урожай» правоохранители собрали недавно в Харькове. Как сообщили в пресс-службе УСБУ, производство пилюль наладили двое мужчин из Дергачей (23-х и 33-х лет): таблетки фасовали в Харькове под марками известных иностранных фармпроизводителей и планировали продавать в тренажерных залах Украины и даже России. Таблетки тысячами изымали в местах производства в Харькове и на таможенном пункте пропуска «Хоробичи» (Черниговская область). После этого Дергачевский суд вынес решение осудить «фармацевтов на дому» на 5 лет, а стероиды сжечь.

description.hltext_display: Long-time Secret in Staying Young
description.content:
2 hours ago
There are so many things that come our way from day to day. These may include problems and challenges. But we have to cope up with those though not immediate because if we let it prolong for a longer period of time, that may be harder for you to start. What I am trying to tell you is when you decide to move on and forget about your burdens, you just have to start it with all your heart. If you let it continue for quite some time, you may find wrinkles invading your entire face. So, you have to know some ways on how to prevent aging. You may once in a while visit your dermatologist and ask your friend in nursing scrubs as to the best thing to apply onto your face. But before that, you may first try about the healthy diet, exercise and enough sleep.
The reason why sleep is included in here is that it actually plays a very important role in staying young. I have made a reading about some researches in the internet and it says that about less than a hundred people were presented with mixed photos of different people. They were asked to identify who are the attractive ones. The result is laid down and it says there that those who sleep and rest well look a lot beautiful and attractive compared to those workaholic people. Experts in medical scrubs say that if you consume most of your time in working, that you already forget to sleep, you will only turn out to be around 19% more tired, 6% less healthy and 4% less attractive. It is according to the news in the television and published in the internet as well.
As what your friendly medical professionals in nursing scrubs tell you every time you go for a physical examination, eat well and sleep completely. When we speak of complete sleep, that would mean continuous sleep for a period of 8 hours. So, if you sleep less than that, you better eat healthy foods, fruits and a lot of water instead. You know why? It is because when you sleep, blood flow increases on your face, causing you to be refreshed once you woke up. In other words, people who lack sleep actually have problems with respect their face. They appear to be so problematic and old. Wrinkles in their forehead appear and once they smile, all the facial lines appear. It is not good to gaze into.
Another disadvantage that you will get from lack of enough sleep is something which is leading to heart risk. How and why? Well, it is because people with insomnia or those who find it so hard to sleep snore a lot. Snoring for that matter may cause problems in your heart.
So, have a good night sleep!

description.hltext_display: Anelka agent eyes US switch
description.content:
Nicolas Anelka's brother and agent has claimed the striker could move to the United States when his Chelsea contract expires.
The 31-year-old's deal at Stamford Bridge runs until 2012, by which time he will have spent 11 seasons in English football. And he could be tempted to follow former France team-mate Thierry Henry to the States in search of a fresh challenge.
Claude Anelka said, in comments reported by the Daily Star: "Nicolas told me he is interested in playing in the United States. We could see him crossing the Atlantic, and I'm serious when I say this."
He added: "He asked himself what he will do once his current contract runs out.
"The US is quite something, and a dream destination. He says he will give it a try, even though he would earn less money than in somewhere like Qatar."
More National Sport News stories

description.hltext_display: Oswald Ammon holt zwei Mal Bronze bei Wintermeisterschaft
description.content:
Singen: Personalrat im Rathaus muss zurücktreten
Verdi macht Formfehler bei der Wahl vom Frühjahr aus / Weg frei für Neuwahlen
Singen (of). Der Personalrat der Singener Stadtverwaltung muss heute seinen Rücktritt einreichen. Damit soll der Weg frei gemacht werden für Neuwahlen. Die Gewerkschaft Verdi hatte bei der Wahl im Frühjahr Formfehler ausgemacht, weil die Mitarbeiter der Stadtwerke Singen mitgewählt hatten, was sie aber schon seit 44 Jahren gemacht hatten.
Der Grund wird in "Intigen" im Wechsel des Vorsitzes gesehen. Die lanjährige Personalratsvorsitzende Helene Hoffman geht in den Ruhestand, die Nachfolge von Ursula Hanser von Verdi schien abgemacht, doch in er internen Abstimmung setzte sich überraschend Carlo Maroni durch der bei der Wahl allerdings weniger Stimmen als Hanser erhalten hatte. Und dagegen ging nun die Gewerkschaft gerichtlich an.

description.hltext_display: Floyd T. Binns Middle School holds Winter Arts Extravaganza
description.author: Stafford County Sun
description.content:
Popular singer/songwriter Tom Petty once sang that, The waiting is the hardest part. That may have been true Tuesday evening as scores of young musicians and vocalists waited downstairs at for the 7 p.m. start of the evenings Winter Arts Extravaganza.
Decked out in their finery for the occasion, the young ladies marveled at seeing each other in their formal gowns; the young men giggled as their classmates turned up in dark pants and formal white shirts adorned with bowties - some black, some silver with matching cummberbunds. Perhaps the schools art students had it easiet, as their work was done before the event even started.
Their works were displayed proudly along the main hallway of the school leading to the gym, where the evening performances were due to take place.
Downstairs, members of the schools choirs gathered in the choir room and chattered anxiously before vocally warming up for the event.
Much the same was going on in the adjacent band room as young musicians awaited the call to line up to head to the upstairs gym where the crowd was rapidly reaching capacity. We play later, said trumpetist Ryan McAnnich. Were not playing all together; were playing chain-link. The musicians readily admitted to being excited about performing for their friends, family and classmates gathered upstairs, but many of the young men mumbled awkwardly when asked how long it took them to learn to tie their bowties. Theyre clip-ons, offered one. Finally, the call came and the musicians filed into the hallway en route to their performances.
The show must go on.

description.hltext_display: Old donation scam given new spin by using...
description.content:
TRURO – Allen and Violet Large were responsible for one of the most generous acts in the country this year, donating to family, friends, schools, hospitals, and churches in Nova Scotia, nearly all of the $11.2 million they won from Lotto 6/49.
But when Allen, 75, was alerted to an email scam circulating this week, in which someone purporting to be him asks for the receiver's trust in return for an undisclosed donation, he was nothing near charitable to the scammers.
"They've got to be pretty goddamned low, as far as I'm concerned," said Large, when reached Tuesday at his Lower Truro, N.S. home.
"That just makes me pissed right off, to no end," he said. "It may be a rude answer, but that's just the way I feel about it."
The Victoria Times Colonist received the email in its general inbox on Tuesday morning.
The email, sent from an Italian domain name and written in poorly translated English, claims the Larges "are under great pressure coming from family, friends, lawyers, cooperate (sic) bodies and Government since we made this proposition public.
"This is why we needed someone who is anonymous and not connected to this set of people that has been bugging our life with corrupt intention."
Staff-Sgt. Paul Proulx, of the RCMP's Canadian Anti-Fraud Centre, said he considered the email to be a new spin on one of the oldest scams around - Advance-fee, or Nigerian-letter fraud.
The scammer typically sends an unsolicited request to share a large sum of money in return for a fee to help with the proceedings. While the author of this most recent email doesn't ask outright for a specific fee or personal information, he does say they performed "a personal research for selfless and competent personality. Can we trust you?"
Questionable grammar aside, Proulx credited the scammers for using a recent news story to hook potential victims - particularly Canadian ones.
"I'd say it's ingenious," said Proulx. "It's well done, somebody's put in quite a bit of time to make this happen."
Proulx said the RCMP investigates every alleged scam submitted to the fraud centre.
As with all spam, Proulx said the best course of action is to delete it even before opening it, regardless of what the email's subject heading might read.
Large said he won't let it get to him over the holidays, as he and Violet, 78, intend to spend the last weeks of the year at home, in what must be one of the more low-key Christmases for a couple only five months removed from winning $10 million.
Large said he and Violet, who recently has undergone chemotherapy for cancer, had just returned Tuesday from an appointment with a specialist in Halifax, where she was given a good prognosis for the coming months.
"She's coming along pretty well," Large said. "She's a long ways from being out of the woods yet, but she's doing pretty well."
Full text of the email:
Dear,
Compliments
My name is Allen Large and my wife is Violet Large, we are the winner of Lotto 6-49 win
http://www.cbc.ca/canada/nova-scotia/story/2010/07/22/truro-lotto-winners.html
http://gimundo.com/news/article/lottery-winners-allen-and-violet-large-give-11-million-fortune-to-charity/
We have decided to use all the money to support the less privilege and physical challenge on a charitable ground not because my wife is facing a critical health challenge as motiveless people spread such a clumsy propaganda, this has been our mind set, our culture to become symbol of love which affects positively and reaches the lives of those who are under such condition like I mentioned above. We love each other and there is no greater we ever felt for each other better than this, of course we are old what still remain of us rather than this offer we are giving out to the world.
We are under great pressure coming from family, friends, lawyers, cooperate bodies and Government since we made this proposition public, it is wise and early enough we realized that this people are unscrupulous with ulterior motives standing against our best intent towards allocating this fund to the right people and organizations. This called for our personal attention, we decided to make a personal research for selfless and competent personality.
Can we trust you?
This money would be allotted not to one organization or people, we have decided to extend our arms to other part of the world (countries), this is why we needed someone who is anonymous and not connected to this set of people that has been bugging our life with corrupt intention.
We are anticipating your reply in order to know our stance with you.
Regards,
Mr. Mrs. Allen Large.

description.hltext_display: Kallis in the clear
description.author: Staff Reporter
description.content: Proteas all-rounder Jacques Kallis will be available for the Boxing Day Test against India after escaping a car crash unhurt on Tuesday morning. Kallis crashed an Audi R8 sports car into a neighbours gate in Wynberg at around 2.30am on Tuesday morning. Police were called to the scene of the accident, while Kallis was later picked up by his girlfriend and taken home. Kalliss manager Dave Rundle stressed that there was nothing untoward about the accident. Jacques did have a very minor accident which left his car and somebody's gate post damaged. But he is absolutely fine, Rundle told Reuters. The Wynberg Police were on hand and have issued a statement saying that there was nothing untoward and they are perfectly satisfied that it was an innocent accident. Kallis starred in the Proteas victory in the first Test against India and team management will breathe easier knowing that the veteran all-rounder was not injured in the accident. It happened at 12.30am as I understand it and no one else was involved in the accident except for Kallis, Proteas' spokesperson Michael Owen-Smith told Reuters. Neither Jacques nor anyone else was hurt which we are very grateful for.

event_or_fact.property: there was nothing untoward about the accident.

description.hltext_display: ERC Ingolstadt in der Krise
description.content:
Die Ingolstädter Panther befinden sich in der Deutschen Eishockey-Liga derzeit im freien Fall. Gestern Abend setzte es für den ERC bereits die fünfte Niederlage in Folge. Gegen die Iserlohn Roosters verloren die Schanzer mit 2:3 (0:1, 1:1, 1:1).
Auch Joe Motzkos (links) elftes Saisontor verhinderte nicht die 2:3-Niederlage gegen die Iserlohn Roosters, nach der die Panther in der Tabelle nun auf dem vorletzten Platz stehen. Foto: Xaver Habermeier
"Wir sind momentan in einer Krise, aus der wir nur mit ganz viel Leidenschaft wieder herauskommen", sagte Trainer Rich Chernomaz nach der Partie. Die Fans in der mit 2712 Zuschauern nur sehr spärlich besetzten Saturn-Arena sahen das genauso. Nach gut zehn Minuten stellten sie die sonst so lautstarke Unterstützung "ihrer" Panther ein, später skandierte sie gar "Wir haben die Schnauze voll!" Denn was sie über weite Strecken zu sehen bekamen, ähnelte den vergangenen Partien, in denen die Ingolstädter Eishockey-Profis immer wieder den nötigen Biss und Kampfgeist vermissen ließen.
Dennoch waren die Panther lange die bessere, oder zumindest die im Angriff engagiertere Mannschaft. 41 Mal schossen sie auf den Kasten der Iserlohner, die ihrerseits insgesamt nur 14 Schüsse auf ERCI-Keeper Ian Gordon abgaben. Das Problem dabei: Während den Versuchen der Oberbayern zumeist die Genauigkeit und die letzte Konsequenz fehlte, schlug Iserlohns Offensive eiskalt zu. So nutzte beispielsweise Shane Joseph in der 19. Minute in Überzahl den ersten wirklich gut herausgespielten Angriff der Roosters zur überraschenden und glücklichen 1:0-Führung. Auf der anderen Seite hatte kurz zuvor Colin Forbes (17.) die beste Möglichkeit der Schanzer vergeben, als er allein vor Torhüter Manny Legace an eben diesem scheiterte.
Verdientermaßen schaffte Ingolstadts Topscorer Joe Motzko mit seinem elften Saisontor zu Beginn des zweiten Drittels den Ausgleich (22.). Und wer weiß, welchen Verlauf die Partie genommen hätte, wenn die Panther wenig später eine gut fünfminütige Überzahlsituation genutzt hätten, um selbst in Führung zu gehen. Doch nachdem zahlreiche Anläufe der Ingolstädter Offensivakteure entweder an der eigenen Ungenauigkeit oder an einem souveränen Torhüter Legace scheiterten, bewies Iserlohn erneut, was Effektivität bedeutet. Gerade als die Roosters wieder komplett auf dem Eis waren, nutzte Cam Paddock ein feines Zuspiel von Kris Sparre zum 2:1 für die Gäste. Im Schlussdrittel setzte dann Michael Hackert noch einen drauf und brachte sein Team mit zwei Toren in Führung (47.).
Leise Hoffnung keimte auf Ingolstädter Seite auf, als Felix Schütz in der 50. Minute den Anschlusstreffer erzielte. Mit Schwung kam er aus der neutralen Zone angefahren, ließ Goalie Legace schließlich mit einem kurzen Haken aussteigen und schob die Scheibe zum 2:3 ins Netz. Erneut bot sich den Panthern die Möglichkeit, dem Spiel vielleicht doch noch einmal eine Wende zu verpassen, aber als Iserlohn in der 53. Minute einen Penalty zugesprochen bekam - Jakub Ficenec und Christian Chartier hatten den konternden Steven Rupprich in die Zange genommen - schien die Partie gelaufen. Zwar vergab der Gefoulte selbst den "Elfmeter des Eishockeys", an der Ingolstädter Niederlage änderte sich jedoch nichts mehr. (bmi)
ERC Ingolstadt: Gordon - Hambly, Ficenec; St. Jacques, Degon; Daschner, Chartier - Waginger, Gawlik, Schütz; Forbes, Wren, Motzko; Huebscher, Hussey, Fical; Retzer, Buzas, Walsh. - Tore: 0:1 Joseph (19.), 1:1 Motzko (22.), 1:2 Paddock (34.), 1:3 Hackert (47.), 2:3 Schütz (50.). - Zuschauer: 2712.

description.hltext_display: Japan's trade surplus contracts 55.4 percent in November
description.content:
Japan's trade surplus shrank 55.4 percent in November from a year earlier, marking the first decline in three months, the finance ministry said Wednesday.
The overall surplus stood at 162.8 billion yen (1.94 billion dollars), the ministry said, much smaller than the market forecast of 446 billion yen.
Exports for the month rose 9.1 percent to 5.44 trillion yen, the 12th straight monthly increase, with strong foreign demand particularly for Japanese steel and metal working machinery, the ministry said.
Imports also expanded 14.2 percent to 5.28 trillion yen, rising for 11 consecutive months, driven up by demand for iron ore as well as audio and visual devices.

description.hltext_display: 够用就好，入手鑫睿i-1100套装
description.content: 记得刚刚接触电脑的时候，经常跑去网吧打游戏，当时的鼠标手感非常差，真想发誓说一辈子都不用鼠标了，但是这显然是不太靠谱，相反现在几乎每天都离不开这玩意，现在的人对鼠标的要求越来越高了，特别是那些游戏达人。我承认我不是一个游戏玩家，所以对鼠标的要求也只要求手感好，性价比高，最好是鼠标键盘一起买的套装。现在买无线我也喜欢买套装的 我最近才买了一套无线键鼠套装i-1100，它的主体颜色为经典黑与时尚银，键盘与鼠标格调统一，非常喜欢它的简约美观。 套装的键盘仿照笔记本键盘的键帽设计，键程较短，但触感还是比较舒适，巧克力超薄键帽 鼠标采用了银黑搭配的外观设计。采用了左右对称的人体工学设计，左右手都适合使用。在鼠标底部还有一个开关设计，平时不用之时可以选择关闭，更加节能。 到目前为止，这套装我还是使用的挺满意的。可能是没用多久的缘故吧

description.hltext_display: Principal IM targets IFA market with new hire
description.content:
Principal Investment Management has become the latest asset manager to overtly target the IFA market in 2011 with the strengthening of its new business development team.Principal Investment Management has become the latest asset manager to overtly target the IFA market in 2011 with the strengthening of its new business development team. Principal has hired Kevin Long, formerly of Close Investments, Cavendish, Exeter Investment Group and Old Mutual, to help boost its business with intermediaries in the London area.
The firm says it has already generated record new business inflows in 2010, with asset under management now standing at 1.2bn, and anticipates that Longs appointment will drive it further forward. "Our presence in the capital is as strong as ever, and will only get stronger. Kevin's role is to open up new IFA relationships within the London area, said Principal CEO Hugh Titcomb.
Last month a study from Defaqto suggested that discretionaries still had in order to attract IFA business ahead of RDR implementation, suggesting that transparency over fees and an ability to demonstrate past performance remained the key areas for improvement.

event_or_fact.property: Kevin's role is to open up new IFA relationships within the London area

description.hltext_display: House prices to fall 2% in 2011
description.content:
House prices are likely to drop by 2% over the coming year and could fall by as much as 5% if government austerity measures derail the economy, the Royal Institution of Chartered Surveyors (RICS) said.
The housing market is likely to see a downward trend that stabilises in spring, with prices then creeping back up towards the end of the year, RICS said. It describes the anticipated 2% fall in prices as 'negligible' but adds that restricted bank lending and government spending cuts and tax rises could hit prices harder.
"Even in this environment, our judgment is that the lack of new supply is likely to prevent the decline amounting to very much more than 5%," RICS said.
Government austerity measures are expected to kick in next year, with a VAT rise to 20% from 17.5% early in January a taste of things to come. The effect of public sector job cuts has already been felt, with the number of people employed in the public sector falling by 33,000 to 6.01m in the three months to October. About 10 times that number are expected to lose public sector jobs in the next four years.
Figures from the Council of Mortgage Lenders earlier this week showed that mortgage lending was down 5% in November compared with the previous month and was almost 10% lower than the same time last year.
