description.hltext_display: Shivaraj Kumar set to rock screen with 6 getups
description.content: He is one short of completing his century in a career spanning more than two decades. No we are not talking about a cricketer but about Sandalwood actor Shivaraj Kumar, whose 99th film Mylari is all set to hit screens across South India this Friday. According to reports in the media, Shivanna will play six roles in his upcoming film. Confirming this news to the media is the actor himself who says that he is being reintroduced in the Kannada film industry when he is almost going to complete filming hundred films!At 49 years of age, Shivaraj Kumar will also portray the role of a college boy. While that sounds surprising, the actor is not worried at all because he has complete faith in his director R Chandru and also feels that his upcoming project Mylari has a strong script which will be loved by the audience and the critics. While the college boy is one among the six avatars that Shivaraj Kumar has adopted in Mylari, another shows him matching steps to peppy numbers for the Kannada screen. The actor promises to introduce some new dance steps in his upcoming project.Since so much effort has gone into the making of the upcoming Sandalwood project, isnt Shivaraj Kumar upset over the fact that the release of Mylari has been stalled for a week? No, shoots the 49- year-old actor and adds that he is rather happy about the delay in release date because this will mean that Mylari plays in theaters during Christmas, which may attract more audiences to theaters. Shivanna sure sounds upbeat about Mylari.

description.hltext_display: Priyo: Yang Ngeluh Setgab Laporan Langsung ke SBY Aja!
description.author: Stevy Maradona
description.content:
REPUBLIKA.CO.ID, JAKARTA -- Ketua DPP Partai Golkar, Priyo Budi Santoso, menyarankan partai yang memiliki keluhan tentang setgab untuk langsung mengadu ke presiden. Meski Golkar menilai keluhan partai koalisi tentang setgab adalah fenomena yang lumrah.
''Saya sarankan keluhan itu langsung disampaikan ke presiden,'' katanya.
Tindak lanjut kritik sejumlah partai koalisi tentang setgab juga bisa disikapi dengan melakukan pembicaraan internal antara para ketua umum partai. Priyo mengakui tindak lanjut dibutuhkan sebagai upaya cara menyelesaikan kekisruhan dalam setgab.
Priyo sendiri melihat ketidakpuasan partai lain sebagai fenomena politik yang lumrah. Ia meminta partai lain tidak menanggapinya secara sinis.
Ia mengingatkan, setgab dibentuk bukan sebagai ajang penyeragaman pendapat. Sedari awal setgab memang didirikan sebagai tempat berkumpul dan bertukar pikiran antarpartai koalisi.

description.hltext_display: Destinará ayuntamiento 650 mil pesos para atenuar los problemas de contaminación
description.content:
El presidente municipal Yuan Yee, anunció ayer que en enero se invertirán 650 mil pesos para empezar a solucionar el problema de contaminación generado por el basurero. Foto: El Sudcaliforniano
Javier Chávez Davis
LORETO, BCS.- Recursos por el orden de los 650 mil pesos, se aplicarán a partir del mes de enero para atenuar los problemas de contaminación que genera el basurero municipal, así lo anunció el día de ayer el presidente Municipal Yuan Yee Cunningham, al recibir a un grupo de empresarios y ciudadanos que desean conformar el Comité técnico del programa de prevención y gestión integral de residuos sólidos.
Tras reconocer el interés ciudadano de esta agrupación para coadyuvar en la solución del problema de manejo de basura en esta ciudad, el alcalde loretano expuso que con recursos del Fideicomiso de Obra e Infraestructura Social (FOIS), se iniciará a partir de enero con este trabajo de ordenamiento del basurero para evitar la liberación de gases, que son los que provocan el fuego en este punto de desechos de la ciudad.
Así mismo se acordó con los asistentes a esta reunión celebrada en sala de Cabildo, que los primeros días de enero se deberá tomar protesta a este comité, se comenzará a trabajar en el diseño de acciones inmediatas y a mediano y largo plazo, y se tendrá que incluir a más agrupaciones, instancias y ciudadanos en este grupo representativo que se preocupa por el tema del basurero y la grave problemática que representa para los ciudadanos loretanos, sobre todo por los efectos en la salud y la mala imagen del destino.
Ahí mismo, autoridades municipales y promotores de este comité, coincidieron en que la ciudadanía debe tomar urgentemente mayor consciencia sobre el manejo adecuado de la basura orgánica e inorgánica.
Entre los asistentes a este encuentro estuvieron representantes de desarrolladores, hoteleros, UABCS, Parque Nacional Bahía de Loreto, Ecoalianza, FONATUR, regidores y comerciantes.
El alcalde Yuan Yee Cunningham señaló finalmente que con el esfuerzo conjunto de autoridades y ciudadanía, se podrá atender de forma contundente el problema del basurero, el cual, aclaró, tiene ya varios años generando una lamentable contaminación que daña a las familias.

description.hltext_display: El Nikkei baja ligeramente por la recogida de beneficios
description.content: Tokio, 22 dic (EFE).- La Bolsa de Tokio terminó hoy con un ligero descenso del 0,23% en una jornada en la que llegó a tocar su máximo desde el pasado 14 de mayo, lo que motivó una rápida recogida de beneficios.

description.hltext_display: Japan: Exporte steigen im November
How to Watch Streaming Video Anywhere in the World
description.content:
So you're jetting off to a tropical island in uncharted waters. But how are you supposed to enjoy paradise when copyright laws put the international hammer down on Netflix? Winter travelers, meet your new best friends: Proxy and VPN services.
Watching geographically restricted content can be tricky. Streaming services like Hulu and Netflix (as well as other network sites) employ geotracking software to make sure nobody outside of the US can dip in to watch The Office or Exit Through the Gift Shop. And it's not just Americans who have this problem: Foreigners traveling to the US can't watch their obscure racing leagues and alternative ball sports. It's lame, really. But don't fret. There are fairly quick ways to get around these pesky barriers—namely, by using either a proxy or VPN service. Both of these options reroute your computer's network connection and change your IP address to make it look like it's coming from somewhere else—like, say, the US. They work in slightly different ways.
Think of the proxy server as a kind of browser-based filter. In simple terms, it sends your traffic through another IP address that is located somewhere else. Then, when you fire up Firefox, Internet Explorer, or Chrome, web pages are routed to you via the proxy server with whatever benefits are associated with it—security, speed, geographic location etc. VPN ( which stands for Virtual Private Network), on the other hand, actually encrypts and reroutes all of your Internet access, effectively replacing your local ISP. We'll go over both options for the expat or jetsetter jonsin' for his home-cooked entertainment.
Netflix, Hulu, and sites like ABC.com look at your IP address to determine where in the world you're browsing from. But fooling them isn't all that hard. If you want a quick and easy way to bypass these annoying roadblocks, you can sign up for a proxy service like IP Hider. There's a free trial version of the software you can try, although it's PC-only. If you use Firefox, it'll provide an easy way to change your settings so that once you have IP Hider up and running, you can appear to be anywhere on the connected planet.
Here's how to do it:
Going with a VPN service is another way to access your favorite content back home. It's also the most general-purpose way to view video content that has been restricted online. For one thing, proxies that support video must be custom coded to support each site so, for the most part, only the biggest sites will work. Unlike a proxy, a VPN will grant you a secured connection for all the programs you use, whether it's ICQ, email, or anything else. The only downside is that you usually have to pay for it if you want any kind of decent speed.
Here's how to do it:
A quick note: Just because we showed you how to do this, doesn't mean we endorse it. Please consider this guide a useful thought exercise—and nothing more.
Original illustration by Gizmodo guest artist Shannon May. Check out more of her work on her website.
Send an email to Bryan Gardiner, the author of this post, at bgardiner@gizmodo.com
Gizmodo is the world’s most fun technology website, focused on gadgets and how they make our lives better, worse, and more absurd.

description.hltext_display: 中职教委秘书长会议力助2011上海职教展
description.content:
简要内容：目前2011SIEE上海职教展已有上海景格、天津三英等一批企业抢占显要展位，2011SIEE上海职教展也将重点组织长三角地区职成教科；各职业院校、职教中心、实训基地前来洽谈。
国家中长期教育改革和发展规划纲要（2010-2020）明确提出把教育摆在优先发展的战略地位，职业教育距离终身免费教育指日可待，中国职业教育发展提速，“2011中国职业教育技术发展趋势研讨会、中国教育技术协会职业教育技术专业委员会理事长、秘书长会议”将借势在“2011第二届上海国际职业教育技术装备展览会”(简称：2011SIEE上海职教展) 期间举办。
研讨会将邀请中外知名教育技术专家就职业教育技术发展趋势作专题演讲，研讨会将组织全国职业技术教育院校(含大专、职业学院、中专、技校、职高)教育技术(计算机、信息、网络、远程)教务处、实训中心代表前来参加，并对所有从事职教和展会人士开放。全国职业技术教育研究会下辖煤炭、电子、能源、财贸、机电、轻纺化、农林水、交通运输、医药卫生等九个职业技术教育研究会理事长、秘书长还将商讨、布置2011年研究会工作。
目前2011SIEE上海职教展已有上海景格、天津三英等一批企业抢占显要展位，2011SIEE上海职教展也将重点组织长三角地区职成教科；各职业院校、职教中心、实训基地前来洽谈。组织工作按照两个途径展开，一方面正在与长三角地区各高职联系，另一方面与上海19个区县教育局下属职教相关单位联系，积极与沪上职教各机构接触，发挥上海职教发达优势，确立2011SIEE上海职教展核心价值。

description.hltext_display: Um por Todos. Todos pelo Skooler Perdido Jogo criado pela F/Nazca chega ao fim
description.content:
Chegou ao final o jogo “Um por Todos. Todos pelo Skooler Perdido”, desenvolvido pela F/Nazca para Skol, como parte das ações da marca para o verão.
O objetivo do jogo era encontrar o Skooler (cooler da Skol) no Google Maps. O vencedor e mais três amigos ganharam uma viagem para a Gravidade Zero.
Todas as dicas foram decifradas e a grande final aconteceu no último domingo, 19, ao vivo no Programa Pânico na TV. Para a ação, a F/Nazca produziu mais de 10 filmes, páginas na internet, fotos, ilustrações e aplicativos.
Para assistir quatro dos filmes clique aqui, aqui, aqui e aqui.

description.hltext_display: NMSDC Announces New Vice President of Field Operations
description.content:
Information contained on this page is provided by companies via press release distributed through PR Newswire, an independent third-party content provider. PR Newswire, WorldNow and this Station make no warranties or representations in connection therewith.
SOURCE National Minority Supplier Development
NEW YORK, Dec. 21, 2010 /PRNewswire-USNewswire/ -- Marquis D. Miller has been named vice president of field operations for the National Minority Supplier Development Council, Inc.® (NMSDC®), one of the nation's leading corporate membership organizations, effective Monday, January 3, 2011. Mr. Miller will work with the NMSDC president to maximize organizational performance among the Council's 37 affiliates. He will work collaboratively with the affiliates to help align resources, plans, strategies and actions with NMSDC's mission, and enhance the services provided to NMSDC-certified Asian, Black, Hispanic and Native American businesses.
"Mr. Miller brings more than 20 years of experience in strategic business development, field operations and organizational management to our senior staff," said NMSDC President Joset B. Wright. "I am pleased to welcome an executive of his caliber to this important role and I look forward to working with him to strengthen the NMSDC network."
Most recently, Mr. Miller was head of The Business Mosaic, a consulting practice focused on organizational management in the non-profit, consumer/retail and business services sectors. Previously, Mr. Miller was vice president of business development for SBLI USA Mutual Life Insurance and S. USA Life, a wholly-owned subsidiary of SBLI USA Mutual Life Insurance Company in Chicago's Loop. He has also served as interim vice president of institutional advancement at Chicago State University (CSU), executive director of the CSU Foundation, vice president of external affairs for the Chicago Urban League and vice president of the Corporate Scholars Program of the United Negro College Fund (UNCF). Prior to that role, Mr. Miller was vice president of field operations for the UNCF's Midwest Office in Chicago.
Mr. Miller has a bachelor's degree in social and behavioral sciences from The Ohio State University.
About NMSDC
Providing a direct link between corporate America and Asian, Black, Hispanic and Native American-owned businesses is the primary objective of the National Minority Supplier Development Council, one of the country's leading business membership organizations. It was chartered in 1972 to provide increased procurement and business opportunities for minority businesses of all sizes.
The NMSDC Network includes a national office in New York and 37 Regional Councils across the country. There are 3,500 corporate members throughout the network, including America's top publicly-owned, privately-owned and foreign-owned companies as well as universities, hospitals and other buying institutions. The Regional Councils certify and match more than 16,000 minority-owned businesses with member corporations that want to purchase their goods and services.
For more information about NMSDC, call (212) 944-2430 or visit the Web site at www.nmsdc.org.
©2010 PR Newswire. All Rights Reserved.

description.hltext_display: Kakuta wants regular football
description.content:
Chelsea forward Gael Kakuta set his sights on earning a regular place in Carlo Ancelotti's first team after committing his future to the club by signing a new four-and-a-half year deal on Tuesday.
Reports had suggested the French youngster could be set to leave Stamford Bridge at the end of the season after talks that opened in September failed to come to an agreement over a contract extension.
"Since I signed for Chelsea when I was 16 all I was thinking about was to get to the first team," said Kakuta, who has made nine appearances for the club this season.
"Now I have been playing a few times with the first team and I have signed for four-and-a-half more years, I have to make a way for myself into the starting 11 and make my dream come true.
"The manager said to me it is the right time to play and I think for me it is as well. It's my job to do my best and try to play more often and show the coach that I am good enough to play in the team."
Blues boss Carlo Ancelotti has put faith in Kakuta, Dutch youngster Jeffrey Bruma and English prospect Josh McEachran, rather than dip into the transfer market this season.
The Italian also hopes to add 15-year-old Feyenoord defender Nathan Ake in January.
The Londoners are understood to have come to an agreement with the Dutch club over the transfer of the youngster, who is expected to sign a professional contract at Stamford Bridge when he turns 16 in February - a deal which will see Feyenoord receive compensation set by a tribunal.
The move for Ake has caused controversy in Holland, where Feyenoord sporting director Leo Beenhakker, without naming Chelsea specifically, expressed his dismay at how he thinks Premier League clubs are taking youngsters from their clubs before their 16th birthday.
"It's driving me crazy that hot prospects are walking away from us like this," Beenhakker told Dutch newspaper Algemeen Dagblad. "The Premier League clubs spoil the market with their behaviour. Other clubs in Europe aren't doing this kind of things, but the English sides just don't care."

description.hltext_display: С зеркальным счетом
description.content:
Мы знали, что этот выезд будет для нас нелегким, признался президент и главный тренер Авроры Эдуард Баткин. Во втором матче за полторы минуты до конца мы были впереди 3:2. Но тут, к сожалению, дважды ошиблась Дарья Хакимова, и отыграться у нас уже времени не хватило. До этого критического момента игрой команды я был доволен, но концовка огорчила. А ведь в случае двойного успеха мы бы могли сегодня спокойно вздохнуть перед матчами с пензенской Лагуной. Календарь высшей лиги составлен так, что команды на сегодняшний день провели различное количество матчей. Три претендента на медали потеряли одинаковое количество очков по шесть. Однако по набранным турнирную таблицу чемпионата уверенно возглавляет Снежана 24 очка, у Лагуны 18 очков. Аврора имеет 12 очков. Матчи с Лагуной состоятся 25 и 26 декабря в ФОКе Калининского района (ул. Д. Бедного, дом 9А).
Правда, есть в петербургской команде и приятные новости: в сборную России вызваны сразу восемь футболисток Авроры. В начале января национальная сборная проведет в Москве подготовительный сбор, после чего отправится на международный турнир в Будапешт.На чемпионате России по мини-футболу среди женщин петербургская «Аврора» (действующий чемпион) встречалась в гостях с одним из главных конкурентов подмосковной «Снежаной». Победила дружба 4:3 в первой встрече, 3:4 во второй

description.hltext_display: Wird Barack Obama 2012 wiedergewählt?
description.content:
ngton: Kein Zweifel: Barack Obama erlitt in diesem Jahr einige Nackenschläge. Die Frage ist nun: Kann er das Blatt wenden? Hat er Chancen, 2012 als US-Präsident wiedergewählt zu werden?
© ap
US-Präsident Barack Obama
Die wichtigste Weichenstellung für das weitere politische Schicksal Barack Obamas kommt gleich zum Jahresanfang. Vermutlich schon Ende Januar verlässt nämlich David Axelrod das Weiße Haus. Für den engsten Vertrauten des Präsidenten gibt es Wichtigeres zu tun: Er soll die Kampagne zur Wiederwahl bei den Präsidentenwahlen 2012 vorbereiten.
Zwar befindet sich Obama derzeit nicht gerade in Hochform. Aber aufgeben will er noch lange nicht - Experten sagen ihm für 2012 nicht mal schlechte Chancen voraus. Der Ökonomie-Professor Ray Fair von der Yale-Universität stellt bereits komplizierte Rechenmodelle auf, die Obama 2012 vorne sehen - vorausgesetzt die Wirtschaft brummt.
Sarah Palin: Kandidiert sie 2012 gegen Obama?
Seit Jahren untersucht der Experte den Zusammenhang zwischen wirtschaftlicher Entwicklung und Präsidentenwahlen. “Wenn mein Modell richtig ist, könnte es für Obama gar nicht besser aussehen.“ Ganz gleich, wer gegen ihn antrete. Allerdings: Der Professor arbeitet mit der Prämisse, dass spätestens im Wahljahr die Konjunktur endlich richtig anspringt.
Auch im Weißen Haus herrscht das Prinzip Hoffnung: In dem verflixten Jahr 2010 lief so ziemlich alles schief, was schieflaufen konnte. Selbst Obamas erfolgreiche Projekte - etwa die Gesundheits- und Finanzreform - haben nicht den erhofften Applaus gebracht. Da kann es nur noch aufwärts gehen. Das gilt vor allem für die Wirtschaft.
Zwar sagen die Experten für 2011 erst einmal weiter hohe Arbeitslosigkeit voraus - doch dann müsste es eigentlich vorangehen, so das Kalkül. Zwar hat die Schlappe für das Obama-Lager bei den Kongresswahlen wie ein Schock gewirkt - doch neueste Umfragen warnen davor, das Ergebnis überzuinterpretieren.
Einer Erhebung der “Washington Post“ und dem TV-Sender ABC zufolge, finden immer noch 49 Prozent der Amerikaner, dass Obama einen guten Job macht. “Republikaner haben zwar große Gewinne bei den Wahlen gemacht, aber sie müssen erst noch die Herzen und Köpfe der Amerikaner erobern“, folgert das Blatt.
Auch das wichtigste innenpolitische Ereignis des kommenden Jahres (Katastrophen wie Terroranschläge oder Ähnliches ausgenommen) steht schon fest: Vermutlich im Sommer wird das “Warmlaufen“ der potenziellen Obama-Gegner beginnen. Noch halten sich die möglichen Bewerber zurück, niemand will als erster starten - das könnte womöglich nur schaden.
Doch auch hier sehen die Umfragen für Obama gut aus. Sollte etwa tatsächlich die populistische und kampfeslustige “Mama Grizzly“ Sarah Palin antreten, kann sich Obama nur freuen. Laut einer NBC-Umfrage würde der Präsident die Ex-Gouverneurin aus Alaska glatt mit 55 gegen 33 Prozent aus dem Feld schlagen.
Bei dem eher glatten Mitt Romney, dem ehemaligen Gouverneur von Massachusetts, wäre es schon knapper: Da läge Obama mit 47 gegen 40 Prozent vorn. Wie seine politische Strategie bis zu den Wahlen aussieht, hat Obama bereits signalisiert: Schmusekurs mit den Republikanern.
Angesichts der neuen Mehrheiten bleibt ihm auch kaum etwas anderes übrig, als Kompromisse zu schließen. Großprojekte wie etwa Klimaschutz und Einwanderung, wo ihm der Wind der Opposition ins Gesicht weht, hat der Präsident schon in aller Stille abgeblasen. Obamas Vorbild heißt Bill Clinton. Der hatte nach knapp zwei Jahren im Amt 1994 auch eine schwere Abfuhr an den Urnen erlitten.
Danach arbeitete er mit den Republikanern zusammen - und wurde weitere 1996 als Präsident wiedergewählt. So schwebt das auch Obama vor. Der Haken ist nur: Die ansonsten eher chronisch optimistischen Amerikaner sehen diesmal richtig schwarz. Rund zwei Drittel aller Amerikaner meinen, das ganze Land bewege sich in die falsche Richtung.
Fast ebenso viele meinen, die schwerste Rezession seit Jahrzehnten habe für sie ganz persönlich noch kein Ende gefunden. Obama weiß, worauf es in den beiden nächsten Jahren ankommt: Wenn “die Pferde nicht saufen“, wenn die Wirtschaft nicht endlich in Schwung kommt, sieht auch seine eigene politische Zukunft düster aus.
dpa

description.hltext_display: 연평도 사태…최고 수혜자는 북한, 러시아
description.content:
[ⓒ '글로벌 석간 종합일간지' 아시아투데이]
[아시아투데이=윤성원 기자] 북한의 연평도 포격도발 이후 한국군의 연평도 해상사격훈련 실시까지 전개된 일련의 긴장상태가 소강국면에 접어들면서 관련국 간 득실이 드러나고 있다. 영토를 직접적으로 포격당하고 인명피해를 낸 한국과, 북한을 비호한다는 인상을 떨쳐내지 못한 중국이 외교적 손익계산에서 손해를 봤다는 평가가 나오는 가운데 북한과 러시아가 이번 국면에서 가장 많은 이득을 챙겼다는 분석이다.
러시아는 연평도 국면의 최대 ‘수혜자’로 떠올랐다. 한반도에서 영향력이 큰 미중 사이에서 적극적 역할을 통해 중재자로서의 이미지를 구축했다는 평가다. 남북한은 한반도 위기 사태와 관련해 ‘중간자적 입장’을 지켜온 러시아의 지지를 확보하기 위한 ‘원정 외교전’까지 벌였다.
북한의 도발을 명시적으로 규탄하면서 한국, 미국 정부와 긴밀한 협력관계를 유지했고 지난 19일에는 한반도의 긴장사태를 논의하자며 유엔 안전보장이사회 긴급회의를 요구하는 등 러시아의 역할은 6자 관련국 가운데 가장 두드러졌다.
러시아는 그간 진행된 6자회담 국면에서 자국 언론으로부터도 “소외됐다”는 지적을 받았지만, 이번 국면에서 확실한 존재감을 국제사회에 인식시켰다. 올 초 천안함 사건 이전 6자회담 재개를 위한 관련국 간 물밑 움직임이 진행되면서 관망세 속에서도 6자회담의 새판짜기 흐름에서 소외되지 않기 위해 적극적 개입노력을 시도했던 러시아가 연평도 사건을 통해 외교적 결실을 달성한 셈이다.
북한은 연평도 도발로 한반도 긴장을 고조시킴으로 국제사회에서 외교적 고립이 더욱 심화될 것이라는 지적에도 불구하고 중국으로부터의 확고한 지원 의사를 재차 확약받았다는 점에서 나름의 성과를 달성했다. 중국 외교부는 21일 “북한도 핵을 이용할 권리가 있다”는 입장을 발표하며 “평화적 핵이용”을 외치는 동시에 핵실험을 강행하는 북한 주장에 동조하는 분위기를 연출했다.
또 연평도 포격으로 ‘김정은 후계 체제’ 구축을 위한 내부적 안정을 공고화했고, 한국 사회에 극단적인 전쟁 공포를 심는 데 성공함으로써 ‘남남(南南)갈등’의 골을 더욱 깊게 팠다. 국제사회에 서해 북방한계선(NLL)을 분쟁수역으로 확실히 인식시키는 데 성공했다는 점도 주요 성과다.
{ⓒ '글로벌 석간 종합일간지' 아시아투데이}

description.hltext_display: Köping föll mot serieledare
description.content:
– Domarna släppte en solklar fasthållning på mittplanen i momentet som föranledde deras avgörande mål, säger KIBF-tränaren Kjell-Åke Köld. Matchen präglades av ett högt tempo, bra kamp och intensitet. Det var fighting face på samtliga spelare i KIBF som också inledde matchen bäst och hade ledningen med 2–1 efter första perioden och med 4–3 inför den sista. Men i den sista perioden var det Telge som visade varför de leder serien och vände till vinst 5–4.
Läs hela artikeln i Bärgslagsbladet/Arboga Tidning, onsdag.

description.hltext_display: Пожар в офисном здании в центре Екатеринбурга потушен
description.content: ЕКАТЕРИНБУРГ, 22 дек — РИА Новости. Пожарные ликвидировали возгорание в офисном здании в центре Екатеринбурга, погибших и пострадавших нет, сообщил РИА Новости представитель пресс-службы Главного управления МЧС РФ по Свердловской области.

description.hltext_display: Dembele: "Hopelijk deze week weer op het veld"
description.content:
Moussa Dembele hoopt van de week zijn opwachting te maken op het trainingsveld van de Engelse club Fulham. Onze landgenoot liep midden november een enkelblessure op tijdens de oefeninterland tussen Rusland en België. Moussa Dembele belandde een maand geleden met zijn linkerenkel onder het lichaam van een Rus. Na onderzoek bleek dat er een probleem is met de ligamenten.
Mijn enkel is weer sterk, ik hoop dat ik deze week opnieuw het veld op kan "Het herstel is traag gegaan", vertelt Dembele op de website van Fulham. "Ik had gehoopt dat het allemaal wat sneller zou gaan, maar het belangrijkste is dat ik me nu goed voel. Mijn enkel is weer sterk, ik hoop dat ik deze week opnieuw het veld op kan." "Ik zag onze laatste wedstrijden tegen Arsenal (2-1-verlies) en Sunderland (0-0). We namen initiatief, maar hadden geen geluk." "Dat is niet nieuw. We hebben al goede wedstrijden gespeeld dit seizoen, maar bleven te vaak steken op een draw. We moeten dringend weer winnen. Het tikje geluk ontbreekt nog." Fulham staat momenteel op een 17e plaats, net boven de gevarenzone.

description.hltext_display: 兽兽惊艳亮相车站 真空上阵当车模
description.content: 2010年12月20日，广州，2010广州车展20日举行，淡出车展许久的车模“兽兽”翟凌助阵西班牙超级跑车展台。一袭露背绿裙的她胸脯高耸大秀美背，惊艳性感。

description.hltext_display: 90 años con Alicia Alonso
description.content:
LA HABANA, Cuba. Cuba festejó el 90 cumpleaños de su legendaria bailarina Alicia Alonso con una gala de música y ballet dedicada a la prima ballerina assoluta de la isla.
El público en el dorado Gran Teatro en la Vieja Habana se puso de pie para ovacionar a la vivaz diva cuando ésta considerada una leyenda viviente del ballet internacional y un tesoro nacional en su nativa Cuba entró con aire majestuoso y tomó el sitio de honor previo al inicio del espectáculo del lunes en la víspera de su cumpleaños.
Ataviada en una amplia capa beige y con uno de sus característicos turbantes uno blanco salpicado con lentejuelas, la gran dama le sonrió a sus admiradores y los saludó con la mano.
Pese a una enfermedad ocular que la ha dejado casi ciega, Alonso continúa al mando del , derivado de la que fundó en 1948.Dos de sus protegidos, bailarines estelares del Ballet Nacional, inauguraron la gala con ParAlicia, una coreografía dedicada a Alonso.
Además de la emotiva interpretación de los bailarines Viengsay Valdés y Yadil Suárez, el espectáculo también contó con las actuaciones de la soprano cubana Johana Simón, los cantantes Polito Ibáñez e Ivette Cepeda y una sesión de jazz isleño de Ernán López-Nussa y Habana Report.
Nacida en La Habana el 21 de diciembre de 1920, Alicia Ernestina de la Caridad del Cobre Martínez Hoya comenzó a estudiar ballet a los nueve años. A los 15 se casó con otro estudiante de ballet, Fernando Alonso, y ambos se mudaron a Nueva York, donde ella bailó para el Ballet Caravan, hoy el Ballet de la Ciudad de Nueva York. En 1940, se unió al Ballet Theater de Nueva York, que pasó a ser el .Pronto la ascendieron a bailarina principal y obtuvo grandes elogios en los papeles de Giselle y Carmen así como en sus legendarias interpretaciones de El Lago de los Cisnes.
La vista le falló temprano en su carrera, y bailó muchos de sus papeles famosos estando parcialmente ciega, guiada en el escenario por la ubicación de su pareja y de las luces.
Las últimas siete décadas, su talento casi sobrenatural y su temperamento fogoso y apasionado se han convertido en materia de leyenda.
El programa de la gala del lunes incluyó citas de luminarias mundiales de la danza sobre Alonso: "Desde que la vi en escena por primera vez sólo he soñado con bailar con ella", dijo el legendario bailarín ruso Rudolf Nureyev, mientras que al fallecido coreógrafo francés Maurice Bejart se le atribuyó: "La bailarina es extraordinaria, el personaje no lo es menos".
Pero quizá el elogio más espléndido de la velada vino de dos devotas admiradoras que se acercaron para ver a su ídola.
"Alicia es un tesoro, es una persona única y maravillosa y todos los cubanos estamos muy orgullosos de que sea cubana", dijo Felicidad Carbo, una trabajadora aeroportuaria de 50 años cuya camiseta estampada y pantaloncillos cortos contrastaron con las refinadas ropas que llevaban muchos entre el público. "Es una inspiración. Fue por ella que me hija se metió al baile".
Cuando Alonso emergió en el tope de las escaleras de mármol para retirarse del teatro, una pequeña bailarina de 11 años, , chilló de la emoción.
"Mira mamá, ¡es ella!", dijo la niña con los ojos brillantes. "¡Está hermosa!".

description.hltext_display: Tôn vinh 1.001 tấm gương tiêu biểu to� n quốc
description.content:
(GD&TĐ)- Trong 2 ngày (27 và 28/12) tới, 1.500 đại biểu chính thức sẽ tham dự Đại hội Thi đua yêu nước toàn quốc lần thứ VIII diễn ra tại thủ đô Hà Nội.
Với chủ đề “Đoàn kết, năng động, sáng tạo, thi đua thực hiện thắng lợi nhiệm vụ phát triển kinh tế - xã hội giai đoạn 2011 – 2015”, Đại hội là dịp tổng kết, nhân rộng các điển hình tiên tiến, phát động phong trào học tập tấm gương tiêu biểu trên các lĩnh vực trong phạm vi cả nước, gắn với Cuộc vận động “Học tập và làm theo tấm gương đạo đức Hồ Chí Minh”.
Sẽ có 161 đại biểu là thành viên Hội đồng Thi đua – Khen thưởng Trung ương và Chủ tịch Hội đồng Thi đua – Khen thưởng các bộ, ban, ngành, đoàn thể, tỉnh, thành phố trực thuộc Trung ương.
338 đại biểu là cá nhân Anh hùng Lao động, Anh hùng Lực lượng vũ trang nhân dân; đại diện tập thể Anh hùng Lao động, Anh hùng Lực lượng vũ trang nhân dân; Chiến sỹ thi toàn quốc được phong tặng trong 5 năm qua.
Có 1.001 điển hình tiên tiến, tiêu biểu xuất sắc trên các lĩnh vực đời sống, xã hội. Trong đó có 148 đại biểu là người dân tộc tiêu biểu đại diện cho 53 dân tộc; 322 đại biểu tiêu biểu cho tài năng trẻ, thiếu niên nhi đồng xuất sắc, công nhân, nông dân, trí thức, đại diện tôn giáo, nhân sỹ, nhà giáo, thầy thuốc, nghệ sỹ, nghệ sỹ nhân dân và ưu tú, giải thưởng Hồ Chí Minh, giải thưởng Nhà nước, nhà văn, nhà báo, gia đình và người có công với cách mạng, người khuyết tật vượt khó vươn lên trong cuộc sống; 10 địa biểu là người Việt Nam tiêu biểu đại diện cho hàng triệu người Việt Nam ở nước ngoài và 5 người nước ngoài có công với Việt Nam...
Đại biểu cao tuổi nhất là Giáo sư, Anh hùng Lao động Vũ Khiêu 94 tuổi, đại biểu trẻ tuổi nhất là em Trần Ngọc Diễm Huyền 10 tuổi, học sinh lớp 5, trường Tiểu học Nam Thành Công, quận Đống Đa, Hà Nội.
Theo Hội đồng thi đua khen thưởng Trung ương, 5 năm qua, kể từ Đại hội Thi đua yêu nước lần thứ VII đến nay, công tác thi đua khen thưởng đã được các cấp ủy, tổ chức Đảng, lãnh đạo chính quyền các cấp quan tâm, lãnh đạo, chỉ đạo; Mặt trận Tổ quốc và các đoàn thể nhân dân có sự phối hợp chặt chẽ, các Bộ, ngành và địa phương đã tổ chức nhiều phong trào thi đua phong phú về nội dung và hình thức. Phong trào thi đua đã được gắn kết với cuộc vận động “Học tập và làm theo tấm gương đạo đức Hồ Chí Minh”.
Đặc biệt, việc lồng ghép các phong trào thi đua được tổ chức thực hiện có hiệu quả trên địa bàn tỉnh, thành phố trực thuộc trung ương. Nhìn chung, phong trào thi đua yêu nước đã khơi dậy, động viên và tập hợp được sức mạnh, phát huy được sức sáng tạo, tăng thêm niềm tin của nhân dân đối với Đảng, trở thành động lực, biện pháp quản lý hữu hiệu, góp phần tích cực vào việc thực hiện nhiệm vụ chính trị, phát triển kinh tế xã họi và từng bước cải thiện đời sống nhân dân.

description.hltext_display: Rheinmetall hat Kaufsignal geliefert
description.content:
Kulmbach (aktiencheck.de AG) - Die Experten vom Anlegermagazin "Der Aktionär" raten weiterhin zum Kauf der Rheinmetall-Aktie.
Mit dem Überwinden des hartnäckigen Widerstands bei 55 Euro sei zuletzt ein Kaufsignal generiert worden. Damit habe die Aktie kurzfristig Raum bis zur nächsten technischen Hürde bei 65 Euro. Mittelfristig würden die Experten sogar einen Anstieg bis zum Hoch bei 75 Euro für möglich halten
Bei einem Kursziel von unverändert 70 Euro bestätigen die Experten von "Der Aktionär" daher ihre Kaufempfehlung für die Rheinmetall-Aktie. Der Stoppkurs sollte auf 45 Euro nachgezogen werden. (Ausgabe 52/10 - 01/11) (22.12.2010/ac/a/d)
Offenlegung von möglichen Interessenskonflikten:
Mögliche Interessenskonflikte können Sie auf der Site des Erstellers/ der Quelle der Analyse einsehen.

description.hltext_display: MOVIMIENTOS
description.content:
Ante la inminente salida del “Big Brother”, Rubén Moreira, de la presidencia del CDE del PRI para buscar la candidatura de su partido a la gubernatura, anote los movimientos que se perfilan para reacomodar el partido. Por prelación, “El Chapo” José Luis Flores pasa a la presidencia; apunte que a la Secretaría General va Armando Luna Canales, en estos momentos Secretario de Organización, cargo que a su vez será ocupado por Víctor Zamora, ex tesorero general recién integrado a las labores partidistas. No soy Inés, pero por ahí es.
AMOR PROPIO
Es increíble la falta de amor propio, o de orgullo profesional, de funcionarios como Pablo González y Marco Durán Flores, que se estrenan como titulares de Turismo y Fomento Económico, respectivamente, y no hacen nada para que en los organigramas de sus dependencias publicados en el portal de transparencia del Gobierno de la Gente, aparezcan como lo que son, los jefes del área. Y, vamos, lo de menos es la autoestima de los funcionarios: por un principio de orden la información oficial debe ser correcta, ¿o no?
EL EXPULSADO
La señal está dada dentro del panismo comarcano: todas las declaraciones en torno a José Manuel Villegas deben de referirse a él como el ex panista o el expulsado. Nada en gracia cayó al dirigente Carlos Orta la resolución del Trife de ordenar al PAN nacional que se pronuncie en 10 días hábiles sobre la situación legal del lagunero. Mientras ese pronunciamiento no llegue, el caso no está cerrado, la última instancia no está agotada y Villegas podrá seguir considerándose panista, por más que pataleen dentro del CDE albiazul.
POSADA
Por cierto, poca convocatoria tuvo Orta a la posada que Acción Nacional organizó para los medios de comunicación, la noche del lunes. Nadie de la plana mayor panista estuvo por ahí, ningún senador, ni diputado federal, ni diputado local, tampoco regidores y ni la mayoría de los delegados. El que la hizo bien como capitán de meseros fue Jorge Rosales Saade, quien se lució también al elaborar unas empanadas de picadillo, atún y champiñones.
¿QUÉ PASÓ?
Los vecinos de las colonias Jardines Coloniales, Brisas y Privadas de Santigo se preguntan qué pasó con la reubicación de los depósitos de Pemex que están pegados a sus casas. Lo que se sabe al respecto, es que el Estado ofreció a la paraestatal algún terreno ya sea por la carretera a Monclova, por Kimberly o por la propia carretera Monterrey-Saltillo, pasando el parque industrial, pero es fecha que la empresa no responde a la oferta, hecha originalmente al entonces director general Jesús Reyes Heroles. Ayer Héctor Franco ratificó el ofrecimiento.
NI LA CARA
Ni con los temores de los vecinos, el Subsecretario de Protección Civil, Segismundo Doguin, se conduele para dar la cara, y por segundo día consecutivo les hizo las cruces a los periodistas. Estaría bien saber cuál es el plan de contingencia que Doguin y sus huestes tienen preparado para enfrentar alguna emergencia similar a la que acaba de acontecer en Puebla, con el saldo ya sabido de muertos y heridos.
¡AGUAS!
Si usted piensa pasar por el municipio de Frontera, ¡aguas! Elementos de Policía y Tránsito están deteniendo todo lo que se mueva y tenga motor con el pretexto de supervisar que los muebles traigan la calca de verificación ecológica. Decenas de automovilistas se han visto afectados por la voracidad de estos “servidores”, que piden hasta 500 pesos para no levantar una multa o, en el peor de los casos, no llevarse el mueble con una grúa. Ésta es una práctica que “floreció” cuando Rogelio Ramos, hoy diputado, era Alcalde.
TEMAS
Allá en Torreón sigue habiendo temas de qué hablar… mal, por supuesto. Ahora resulta que el Ayuntamiento lagunero pretende adquirir decenas de viviendas para los policías municipales a una constructora propiedad del marido de una regidora priísta. Mal y de malas la administración de Eduardo Olmos, que está con aquello de que nomás sale de una y entra en otra.
CHIMENEA
En San Juan de Sabinas, el alcalde Antonio Nerio está a punto de concretar el rescate del ícono de la comunidad rositense, “La Chimenea”, construcción de 150 metros de alto, concluida en 1929 y que en su tiempo sirvió para la explotación de carbón mineral. Si se da una vuelta por esos lares, se percatará que por alguna razón, esa chimenea es el orgullo de los habitantes de ese municipio, y más ahora, que a su alrededor habrá un parque de 14 hectáreas con bosque urbano, auditorio y canchas deportivas. Esa obra es lo que para los saltillenses es el DV del Indio o para los nigropetenses, la Gran Plaza.

description.hltext_display: Western Wind has Secured Financing of $24 Million for Kingman
description.content:
VANCOUVER, Dec. 21 /PRNewswire-FirstCall/ - Western Wind Energy Corp ("Western Wind" or the "Company") has closed a $24 million financing for its 100% wholly owned 10.5 megawatt ("MW") combined wind and solar project located in Kingman, Arizona. The financing includes a one year construction loan convertible to a 7 year term loan, a bridge loan to the ITC cash grant from the US Department of Energy and some vendor financing. Construction will start immediately.
The proceeds of this financing will be used to complete construction of the 10.5MW solar - wind project that is believed to be the first utility scale renewable energy project that combines wind and solar under one power purchase agreement. Western Wind now has 165.5 MW of wind and solar capacity either in production or in construction.
KeyBank National Association (KeyBank) has arranged a construction loan of $16 million and a cash grant bridge loan of $4.2 million. The bridge loan will be repaid upon receipt of the cash grant and the $16 million construction loan would convert to a 7 year term with a hedged fixed interest rate averaging approximately 6.78% per annum. The term loan is amortized over 18 years. The KeyBank loans are secured by the assets of Kingman Energy Corp and a guarantee through the construction period has been provided by Western Wind.
A $4 million subordinated loan was provided by a vendor at an interest rate of 6% per annum and secured by a second lien on the cash grant and assets of the Kingman Energy Corp. The loan matures the earliest of the date upon which the Cash Grant is received and one hundred and thirty five (135) days after the Commercial Operations Date.
Incentive Stock Options
Western Wind wishes to announce that it has granted, to employees, consultants and directors 3,000,000 incentive stock options at a price of $1.09 per share exercisable for a period of five (5) years from the date of grant.
About KeyBank
KeyBank is the banking division of Cleveland-based KeyCorp (NYSE: KEY), one of the nation's largest bank-based financial services companies, with assets of approximately $94 billion. Key companies provide investment management, retail and commercial banking, consumer finance, and investment banking products and services to individuals and companies throughout the United States and, for certain businesses, internationally. For more information, visit https://www.key.com/.
About Western Wind Energy Corp.
Western Wind is a vertically integrated renewable energy electrical production company that currently owns over 500 wind turbines with 165.5 MW of rated capacity either in production or in construction in the States of California and Arizona. Western Wind further owns additional development assets for both solar and wind energy in California, Arizona, Ontario, Canada and has a development team in the Commonwealth of Puerto Rico.
Western Wind is in the business of owning and acquiring land sites and technology for the production of electricity from wind and solar energy. Management of Western Wind includes individuals involved in the operations and ownership of utility scale wind energy facilities in California since 1981.

description.hltext_display: «إنفينيتي إتش 35 إم» أول سيارة هجين «صديقة» للبيئة والمشاة معا
description.author: admin
description.content: «إنفينيتي M35h» مرشحة لأن تصبح أول سيارة هجين في العالم مزودة بنظام تنبيه صوتي لتفادي صدم المشاة. ويمكن لهذه السيارة الهجين العالية الأداء أن تنطلق لمسافات أطول وبطريقة أسرع بالنمط الصامت على الكهرباء فقط مقارنة بأي سيارة هجين أخرى. هذا وتستخدم السيارة مجموعة من الأصوات المميزة للمساعدة في ضمان سلامة مستخدمي الطرق الآخرين. ويتم التحكم بتقنية «صوت المركبة القادمة لتنبيه المشاة» (VSP) الجديدة من خلال كومبيوتر يصل جهازا صوتيا في السيارة مع سماعة مركبة في مقدمة المصعد الأمامي. وتعمل هذه التقنية مباشرة لحظة تشغيل السيارة إلى سرعة 30 كلم/ساعة وتتوقف عند سرعة 25 كلم/ساعة مع تباطؤ سرعة السيارة. وبدلا من وجود نغمة واحدة، تم اختيار مجموعة من الأصوات المرتفعة - المنخفضة على مستويات صوتية متعددة بعد تنفيذ برنامج أبحاث مكثفة لمعرفة «الضوضاء» الأكثر فعالية والأقل إزعاجا. وعمل الفريق الذي طور النظام في الشركة الأم لـ«إنفينيتي» بالتعاون مع خبراء في علم النفس الإدراكي والسمعي لدراسة نواح كثيرة بدءا من أنماط سلوك المشاة وصولا إلى التلوث الضوضائي. وبنتيجة هذه الأبحاث، تم التوصل إلى صوت «الموجة الجيبية» الذي يتراوح مداه بين 2.5 كيلوهيرتز عند الحد الأعلى و600 هيرتز عند الحد الأدنى. وهذا المدى مسموع من جميع الفئات العمرية ولكنه يتفادى المدى الصوتي (نحو 1000 هيرتز) الذي يضيف ضوضاء غير ضرورية للبيئة المحيطة. وينتقل الصوت من التردد العالي إلى المنخفض حسب سرعة السيارة وحسب ما إذا كانت «إنفينيتي M35h» تسرع في سيرها أو تخفض سرعتها. ويكون الصوت عند أعلى درجاته لدى التشغيل لإعطاء إشارة واضحة على أن المركبة تبدأ بالتحرك، بينما تستخدم النغمة المتقطعة عند الرجوع للخلف. وتم حساب كلا الصوتين لكي لا تفاجئ «إنفينيتي M35h» المشاة وضعيفي البصر عند اقترابها منهم. وعلى الرغم من أن «إنفينيتي M35h» تسير بسرعات قريبة من 80 كلم/ساعة على الطاقة الكهربائية فقط بمحرك دون ضوضاء، تعني الضوضاء بعد سرعة 30 كلم/ساعة أن «إنفينيتي M35h» تولد صوتا كافيا من خلال «صوت المركبة القادمة لتنبيه المشاة» (VSP) لتبقى بعيدة عن حدوث حالة الصدم. وأظهر برنامج التجارب المكثف في مراحل تطوير السيارة الهجين أنه في ظروف القيادة المتعددة يمكن لـ«إنفينيتي» السير بالنمط الكهربائي فقط لزمن يصل إلى 50% من وقت القيادة. وتعتبر «إنفينيتي M35h» السيارة الثالثة من 3 مركبات «سيدان V6 » ذات الأداء العالي التي تتحدى فئة السيارات التنفيذية التقليدية في القارة. وتجمع السيارة بين محرك V6 يعمل بالبنزين سعة 3.5 لتر وينتج قوة 302 حصان مع المحرك الكهربائي قوة 67 حصانا، لتقدم «إنفينيتي» أداء السيارات الرياضية ذات الاستجابة العالية للغاية مع قدرة على السير بالمحرك الكهربائي من دون انبعاثات على الإطلاق، وفي أحيان كثيرة، لفترات أطول وبسرعات أعلى مقارنة بالمركبات الهجين المتوفرة في الأسواق حاليا.

description.hltext_display: 广州将于明年3月举办第二届国际信息与通信展
description.content:
简要内容：通过组委会了解到，有着上届会成功举办的基础及政府的明确态度，新一届博览会的筹备工作进展顺利，本届展会特增加了台湾展团、韩国展团等，突出体现了博览会的国际特点。
由广东省经济和信息化委员会、广东省通信管理局主办，中国移动、中国电信和中国联通三家运营商共同协办的“2011第二届广州国际3G产业博览会暨广州国际信息与通信技术应用展览会”，将于2011年3月7日在广州拉开帷幕。是目前广东省政府主管部门重点扶持的通信类展会，为广东省经济和信息化委员会确定为工作重点之一的展览，并获得省政府分管领导的支持和肯定。
在第一届博览会的基础上，本届展会特别增加了台湾展团、韩国展团等，突出体现了博览会的国际特点。国内外知名企业也竞相亮相本届博览会。目前参加展览会的企业有128家，其中国内参展商110多家，特邀境外参展商10多家，预计新一届博览会总展出面积22000平方米，展出面积比上届扩大近2.5倍。
通过组委会了解到，有着上届会成功举办的基础及政府的明确态度，新一届博览会的筹备工作进展顺利，本届展会特增加了台湾展团、韩国展团等，突出体现了博览会的国际特点。国内外知名企业也竞相亮相本届博览会，如中国电信、中国移动、中国联通、中兴、华为、京信、爱立信、摩托罗拉、TCL、德赛、三星、天语、杰赛、HTC、新邮通、康佳、LG、联想、信为、重邮、掌中、迈普、中兴新、鼎立方、金桥、华德、图腾、大中、IBM等众多业内知名企业将是本届会的突出亮点。
博览会同期将举办“2011中国（广州）国际移动互联网高逢论坛，2011新一代宽带网络及战略性信息产业研讨会”届时将邀请政府分管领导、国内外信息通信运营机构高层、业内知名企业高层，科研院所、咨询机构、大专院校的学术专家与会演讲与交流，共同探讨移动通讯及移动互联网模式分享成功经验。
“广州通信展”竭诚欢迎国内外客商参展和专业观众光临！咨询热线：020-89232903 联系人：李嘉华 15002022840

description.hltext_display: Bid for new trial rejected in 'Millionaire' case
description.content:
A federal judge refused Tuesday to order a new trial in a lawsuit that resulted in a $319 million judgment against Walt Disney Co. over profits from the TV show "Who Wants to Be a Millionaire."
U.S. District Judge Virginia Phillips wrote in a 54-page ruling that evidence supported the jury verdict in favor of London-based Celador International.
The company sued in 2004, accusing Disney of using creative accounting to hide profits.
Celador won a $269.2 million jury verdict in July, and the companies later agreed that a $50 million interest payment to the show's creators was warranted.
Disney attorneys have argued the judge improperly excluded certain evidence and testimony. Disney has called the verdict "fundamentally wrong" and is likely to appeal.
Lawyer Martin D. Katz, who represents the entertainment giant, did not immediately return a phone message seeking comment about the latest ruling.
"Who Wants to Be a Millionaire" first aired in the U.S. from August 1999 to May 2002. It was then hosted by Regis Philbin and was a smash hit for ABC.
The trial earlier this year included testimony by top brass at Disney, and evidence included an e-mail from former chairman and CEO Michael Eisner that the show was worth "$1B, wild guess, maybe more."
Disney argued that the jury shouldn't have been shown that e-mail, but Phillips' ruling states the jury had other evidence to support its verdict.

event_or_fact.property: in a 54-page ruling that evidence supported the jury verdict in favor of London-based Celador International
the jury had other evidence to support its verdict

description.hltext_display: 瑞茜·威瑟斯彭投资1亿2千万电影票房失利
description.author: www.qq.com
description.content: 一部电影的票房是否成功本是并没有定规。但如果经过一个周末后，电影收入只有其中一个演员薪酬的一半，那就不得不确认这部电影的票房失利了。据媒体报道，由奥斯卡影后瑞茜吠??古恚?eese Witherspoon）主演的爱情喜剧片《你怎知道》（How Do You Know）在经过周末后，其收入排名第8，只进账了760万美金。 除瑞茜吠??古硗猓?闷?沽?缌伺肺姆威尔逊（Owen Wilson），保罗仿返拢?aul Rudd）和杰克纺峥贫???ack Nicholson）等大明星，总成本据称达1亿2千万，其中，34岁的威瑟斯彭的薪金就高达1千500万。

description.hltext_display: Индекс вырос
description.author: Retailer.Ru
description.content:
финансы, акции/облигации, Инфляция, Экономика
Потребительский индекс в декабре прибавил 0,5%, достигнув 334,9 пунктов, подтвердив общегодовую положительную динамику, которая составила 8,5%. При этом динамика конца года не идет не в какое сравнение с его началом. Ожидания низкой инфляции и сокращения государственных расходов в прежних объемах не оправдались, а соответственно и темпы роста индекса значительно снизились.
Рассмотрим причины поведения потребительского индекса, прежде всего текущую и прогнозируемую инфляцию. Некоторое замедление инфляции в ноябре было вызвано тем, что правительство отложило значительные бюджетные расходы на декабрь. Именно в декабре начнутся переводы Минфина бюджетным организациям, которые он обязан сделать до конца года. Они составят около 1,9 трлн руб. Впрочем, в 2010 году инфляция, скорее всего, уложится в 8,5-8,7%. Хотя ее значительное ускорение в декабре, дополнительно обусловленное резким ростом цен производителей. В ноябре они подскочили на 4,4% к октябрю (рекордный рост за последний 21 месяц) и на 16% год к году.
В низкой динамике потребительского индекса уже заложены опасения 2011 года. Официальный прогноз по инфляции в России на следующий год, заложенный в проект бюджета, составляет 6,5%. Что может встать на пути такого прогноза? Например, низкие урожаи в Южном полушарии, прогнозы по ним, к сожалению, нерадостные, что может привести к повышению цен на сельхозпродукцию и создает риски для выполнения прогноза по темпам инфляции на следующий год. Обеспокоенность высокими ценами на продукты питания в мире, которые в ноябре достигли максимума с июля 2008 года, высказывала в начале декабря и Продовольственная организация ООН (ФАО). Индекс ФАО, в расчет которого входят 55 видов продовольственных товаров, растет пять месяцев подряд.
В России вклад продуктов питания в инфляцию может стать решающим. Доля продуктов питания в потребительской корзине более высока, чем в развитых странах, потому инфляция очень чувствительна к ценам на продовольствие. К тому же Россия не обеспечивает себя полностью продуктами, которые являются одной из основных статей импорта. Другими причинами высокой инфляции в 2011 году могут стать рост госрасходов, повышение тарифов естественных монополий и дополнительная денежная эмиссии ЦБ. Другими словами, на рост цен на продовольствие накладывается интенсивное повышение тарифов госмонополий, рост социальных расходов бюджета и резкий рост денежной массы. Например, в 2011 году реальный рост коммунальных тарифов может составить до 15%, социальные расходы бюджета в предвыборный год останутся высокими. С международной точки зрения Россия возглавляет список развитых и развивающихся стран с высоким уровнем инфляции. В США она за 10 месяцев составила 1,1%, в Германии – 1,3%, в Китае – 3,6%, в Бразилии – 4,7%.
Положительным для потребительского сектора выглядит тот факт, что в 2010 году акции компаний потребительского сектора и розничной торговли выглядели существенно лучше рынка. Средний доход с начала года превысил 70 %, что существенно превышает рост индексов РТС и ММВБ, максимальные значения которых колебались вокруг уровней 18-20%. Может показаться, что высокая инфляция может помочь ритейлерам, которые смогут показать высокие темпы роста сопоставимых продаж за счет увеличения продаж на одного человека, как это было в 2008 году, когда инфляция на продукты питания превышала 19 %, но высокий уровень инфляции в 2007-2008 годов не оказывал существенного влияния на покупательскую способность населения, так как рост реальных располагаемых доходов находился на высоком уровне (10-11%) вследствие благоприятных макроэкономических факторов.
Важным фактором, подтверждающим динамику индекса являются данные Росстата, которые указывают, что в третьем квартале 2010 года уровень потребительской уверенности населения, демонстрирующий стабильный рост в течение пяти кварталов, вновь снизился. Основным негативным моментом, повлиявшим на снижение уверенности потребителей, явилось повышение цен на продукты питания. На этом фоне компаниям потребительского сектора будет сложно полностью переложить рост себестоимости продукции на плечи потребителей без снижения объемов реализации, в то время как ритейлеры будут вынуждены ограничить собственную наценку, для того чтобы не потерять клиентов. Это приведет к ограничению возможности для ритейлеров показать увеличение валовой рентабельности. Наоборот, мы ожидаем, что валовая рентабельность компаний розничной торговли продуктами питания будет продолжать находиться под давлением.
Положительно повлиять на ситуацию в потребительском секторе может наличие у банков денежных средств и кредитных ресурсов, за счет которых они могли бы обеспечить рост спроса, а соответственно и потребления. Как следствие - расширение потребительского спроса, снижение дефицита оборотных средств, необходимых для закупки сырья, понижение стоимости кредитных ресурсов, как основные факторы поддержки производств потребительского комплекса.
Приведенный анализ говорит, что структура роста российского потребительского рынка во втором полугодии текущего года принципиально изменилась: если в первом полугодии потребительский спрос уверенно рос, а инвестиции сжимались, то в настоящее время все наоборот: инвестиционная активность находится на очень высоком уровне, но потребительский спрос сокращается. В целом, годовые результаты индекса основаны на негативных ожиданиях бизнеса, связанных с изменением экономической ситуации в секторе, а также ожиданий изменений в личном материальном положении.
Вывод
Высокие инфляционные ожидания, подкрепленные сложностью ситуации в сельскохозяйственном производстве, опережающий рост импорта продовольственных товаров относительно отечественного производства, а также более высокие темпы роста цен на продовольствие по сравнению с ценами на непродовольственные товары и услуги оказывают существенное негативное влияние на динамику и структуру потребления населения. Инфляция в 2011 году может быть на уровне 8-9%. Об изменении тренда потребительского индекса можно будет судить к весне, когда станут понятны итоги повышения тарифов и итоги введения повышенных страховых взносов (бывш. ЕСН).

description.hltext_display: Inggris-Rusia Saling Usir Diplomat
description.author: Djibril Muhammad
description.content:
REPUBLIKA.CO.ID, LONDON--Hubungan Inggris dan Rusia kembali terganggu setelah kedua negara terlibat dalam aksi saling usir diplomat mereka. Inggris terlebih dahulu mengusir seorang diplomat Rusia pada 10 Desember lalu karena diduga melakukan kegiatan spionase, sebelum Rusia mengambil langkah serupa terhadap diplomat Inggris pada 16 Desember kemarin.
Insiden saling usir itu dikhawatirkan dapat mempengaruhi upaya yang sedang dilakukan pemerintahan Inggris saat ini yang sedang berupaya memperbaiki hubungan kedua negara. Sebelumnya hubungan kedua negara itu sempat terganggu saat kritikus Moskow, Alexander Litvinenko yang tewas di London tahun 2006. Litvinenko adalah mantan anggota dinas intelijen Rusia, KGB dan FSB yang memperoleh suaka politik di Inggris. Saat itu Inggris curiga Litvinenko tewas dibunuh pebisnis Rusia yang juga mantan anggota KGB, Andrey Lugovoy. Inggris meminta Rusia segera menyerahkan Logovoy, namun permintaan itu ditolak Moskow.
Menteri Luar Negeri Inggris, William Hague seperti dikutip BBC menyebutkan 'Inggris menolak segala tudingan itu. "Kami tetap terbuka dan ingin membangun hubungan yang menguntungkan dengan Rusia dan negara lain atas dasar saling menghormati hukum setempat," kata Hague.
Sampai kini belum ada komentar resmi dari pihak Rusia terkait kasus tersebut. Awal bulan ini Rusia telah menuding Inggris yang dinilainya mengalami 'paranoid dengan spionase' menyusul terjadinya aksi penahanan terhadap Katia Zatuliveter, seorang ajudan dari politisi partai Lideral Demokrat pada komite pertahanan parlemen Inggris. Harian Sunday Times menyebutkan wanita berusia 25 tahun itu dicurigai terlibat aksi spionase dan terancam di deportasi. Rusia menilai insiden tersebut dapat mengganggu hubungan kedua negara.
Meski hubungan kedua negara terganggu karena masalah spionase, namun tampaknya hal itu tidak merubah rencana Perdana Menteri Inggris, David Cameron untuk memenuhi undangan ke Rusia tahun depan. Bahkan Hague juga telah berkunjung ke Moskow dan menteri Luar negeri Rusia juga akan bertolak ke London.
Hubungan kedua negara juga sempat terganggu saat perusahaan minyak Inggris, BP terlibat konflik bisnis dengan mitranya asal Rusia, ketika mendirikan perusahaan patungan TNK BP. Saat itu BP dituding memanfaatkan hubungan baiknya dengan pemerintah Rusia untuk meraih proyek strategis tahun 2008. Di tahun yang sama, pemerintah Rusia juga menutp sejumlah kantor perwakilan kebudayaan British Council karena dianggap ilegal. n Reuters/hir

description.hltext_display: Nestor Tobias Laments Poor End to Good Year for Boxing
description.content:
BOXING promoter and trainer Nestor 'Sunshine' Tobias said recent infighting within the sport code's fraternity has dwarfed its success stories for the past year.
Speaking to The Namibian Sport yesterday, Tobias said it was damaging to the growth of boxing in the country if those appointed to help the sport don't have its best interest at heart.
Tobias, who received the WBO's award for the Best African promoter of the year, is adamant that continued bickering and "sabotaging" in local boxing circles will lead to its ultimate demise.
"The future of boxing is in our hands," said Tobias. "Those individuals who are supposed to help the sport but are only interested in themselves should go. My career is boxing and will protect and maintain it."
Despite the recent negative publicity that Namibian boxing has received, Tobias said he welcomed healthy competition as long as it was in keeping within the guidelines of the sport code.
"We need more boxers and promoters in order to develop the sport," he said. "We are not against anyone. I encourage anyone to get involved but just make sure you know the basics of the sport and that you have principles."
He further thanked his sponsors and the Namibian government for their support in making fights happen. Tobias said he hoped that more investors would enter the fray next year as the boxers need it in order achieve more on the international scene.
"These guys are putting the country on the map. They cannot do it without the support of the corporate world."
Four fighters from his stable will strive for international glory early next year. On January 21, Martin Haikali will defend his WBO Africa lightweight title in Ghana, with WBO Africa welterweight champion Tyson Uushona scheduled to fight Commonwealth title holder Denton Vassel in Bolton on February 26.
Flyweight boxer Abmerk Shidjuu is also set to challenge Chris Edwards on March 26 in Stoke for the Commonwealth title.
On the same day, WBO Africa light-heavy weight champion Vikapita Meroro will face Thomas Oosthuizen in South Africa for the WBC intercontinental belt.

description.hltext_display: Почти 700 жителей Биробиджана остались без холодной воды из-за аварии
description.content: МОСКВА, 22 дек — РИА Новости. Около 700 жителей Биробиджана остались в среду без холодной воды в результате аварии на магистральном водоводе, полностью подачу воды потребителям планируется возобновить к 23.00 по местному времени (16.00 мск), сообщила РИА Новости представитель главного управления МЧС по Еврейской автономной области Милана Кротова.

description.hltext_display: Tamil CCL team is ready
description.content: When its time to celebrate the ICC World Cup 2011 for the cricket buffs, here comes Celebrity Cricket League (CCL). Well its something really special to look upon as the two religions cricket and films will come together.Celebrity Cricket League involves 4 teams Bollywood (Mumbai Heroes), Telugu film industry (Telugu Tigers), Kannada film industry (Bangalore Stars) and Kollywood (Tamil Superstars). Tamil team has been formed under President of South Indian Artists Association, Sarathkumar's guidance. The first season of CCL will have 6 league matches followed by grand finals.Recently, a press meet pertaining to the Kollywood cricket team was organized by Sarathkumar and his wife Radhika Sarathkumar (CLL secretary) along with the co-founder Vishnu Vardhan Induri. The team members of Tamil Superstars are expected to be Karthi, Jayam Ravi, Shaam, Abbas, Vishnu, Vikrant, Narain, Ramana, Hamsvardhan and many more. Surya is expected to be the brand icon of this team. Captain of the team is yet to be finalized.

description.hltext_display: Farmers Insurance Claims Teams Helping Storm Victims Throughout California
description.content:
Information contained on this page is provided by companies via press release distributed through PR Newswire, an independent third-party content provider. PR Newswire, WorldNow and this Station make no warranties or representations in connection therewith.
SOURCE Farmers Insurance
LOS ANGELES, Dec. 21, 2010 /PRNewswire/ --Farmers Insurance claims personnel, agents and employees throughout California are continuing to help victims of the heavy rain and wind storms that have continued steady for the past several days.
(Logo: http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20080605/LATH062)
Farmers Southern California State Executive Director Charles Dabelgott; Vice President, Los Angeles State Executive Director Bill Matlock; Northern State Executive Director John Weaver; and Inland State Executive Director Kirk Tweedy stated that Farmers claims teams are in full operation helping customers throughout the state. They advise all customers who have suffered damage from the storms should call the 24-hour Farmers HelpPoint hotline number at:
1-800-HelpPoint (1-800-435-7764), for immediate assistance.
Foremost Insurance customers should file their claim by calling: 800-527-3907.
Those with Flood insurance can reach the National Flood Insurance Program at www.floodsmart.gov or (800) 427-9662).
Farmers is a trade name and may refer to Farmers Group, Inc. or the Farmers Exchanges, as the case may be. Farmers Group, Inc., a management and holding company, along with its subsidiaries, is wholly owned by the Zurich Financial Services Group. The Farmers Exchanges are three reciprocal insurers (Farmers Insurance Exchange, Fire Insurance Exchange and Truck Insurance Exchange), including their subsidiaries and affiliates, owned by their policyholders, and managed by Farmers Group, Inc. and its subsidiaries. description.hltext_display: Biomapas AgênciaClick incrementa plataforma da Petrobras
description.content:
A Petrobras realiza um mapeamento de biodiversidade nas áreas onde atua. Para compartilhar essas informações, foi criada uma plataforma de comunicação digital batizada de Biomapas, que incluia espécies da fauna e da flora da região de Urucu, na Amazônia.
Agora, o projeto inclui também espécies marinhas da costa brasileira. O resultado pode ser conferido em um site desenvolvido pela AgênciaClick Isobar, o www.petrobras.com.br/biomapas.
No endereço, é possível consultar nomes e características das espécies catalogadas, bem como visualizar a área de ocorrência de cada uma – recurso obtido graças a integração com o Google Maps. O mapeamento foi feito pelo Centro de Pesquisa Petrobras (Cenpes).
Além do site, o projeto contempla um aplicativo no Facebook – uma espécie de álbum em que os usuários podem ganhar figurinhas (respondendo a perguntas sobre uma determinada espécie) para trocar ou dar de presente aos amigos. E, para os visitantes mais interessados, a agência também criou um endereço no Flickr com mais fotos do projeto.
“Contávamos com muitas informações importantes sobre a preservação das espécies da fauna e flora brasileiras e resolvemos compartilhar através dos meios digitais. Dessa forma, ampliamos as possibilidades de engajamento das pessoas nas questões da preservação ambiental, seja através da troca de informações, ao colecionar figurinhas das espécies pelo Facebook, explorar mapas de presença das espécies no site ou imagens no canal da Petrobras no Flickr", comenta Leonardo Sá, consultor de Multimeios da Petrobras.
Ficha Técnica
Direção de Criação: Juliana Constantino
Arquitetura: Caio Braga
Design: Silvia Melo, Gustavo Terra, Vinicius Maffeis
Propaganda: Daniel Lacroce, Ricardo Dourado, Ricardo Diniz
Interface / Programação: Leonardo Silva, Ricardo Petres
Direção de Atendimento: André Chueri
Atendimento e Negócios: Rafael Laender, Rachel Palhano
Aprovação: Viviane Davico, Rodrigo Freire

description.hltext_display: Analysis: Will Google follow Microsoft in EU probe?
description.content:
SAN FRANCISCO/BRUSSELS (Reuters) - Google Inc's GOOG.O Internet search algorithm is the technology world's equivalent of the Coca-Cola formula: a top-secret corporate crown jewel.
But pressure is growing on Google to lift the veil on some of its inner workings as European regulators investigate complaints that Google's search engine unfairly discriminates against certain websites.
The case underscores the increased scrutiny over Google's influence in the Internet industry and could set the stage for the kind of long-running regulatory battle fought in the past by technology giants like Microsoft Corp MSFT.O. Odds are that the world's No. 1 search engine will seek to keep prying eyes -- even those of the European Commission, known in many circles globally as the toughest watchdog -- away from the ranking algorithms that are the core of its business.
"It is difficult to see how this won't come to an impasse in terms of how far can Google go, in terms of opening up access to their secret sauce as it were, which is the basis for their existence," said Martin Olausson at research firm Strategy Analytics.
If the EU determines that Google abused its position in the search market, the Commission could order Google to alter its search practices, such as providing more transparency into its algorithm, or face a fine of up to 10 percent of annual global revenue.
Google has faced criticism in the past that its technology for determining which websites get top billing in search results is too much of a black box. As Google has grown in clout, and as it begins providing its own Web content such as video within results, calls for greater transparency into its search algorithm have swelled.
The Commission ratcheted up pressure on Google this month when it opened a formal probe into allegations the company had abused its dominant position in the search market.
In addition to the charge that Google rigged its algorithms to lower rivals' rankings, complainants said it unfairly promoted its own services, forced advertisers to accept exclusivity deals, and blocked companies from transferring advertising data to other online ad platforms.
"The complaint is often that there's too much at stake. The claim is Google is now too powerful and it's really tantamount to a utility that everybody uses," said Greg Sterling, an Internet consultant and a contributing editor for the online blog Search Engine Land.
BIG IN EUROPE
The situation is particularly acute in Europe, where Google controls roughly 77 percent of the market share of search queries, according to industry analytics firm ComScore.
This month, the EU confirmed that it had also taken over two complaints about Google's search practices from German competition authorities.
Google has said it intends to cooperate with the EU's investigation. But the company has a history of keeping its search algorithm close to the vest.
While Google provides certain guidelines about its algorithms to help Web publishers ensure that their sites are accurately ranked, the hundreds of specific "ranking factors" that it uses to rank websites, and the weight it attaches to each of those factors, remain a much-speculated-upon mystery.
"We provide more guidance for websites than any other search engine, and we're constantly exploring new ways to be even more transparent with webmasters about our ranking principles," Google spokesman Adam Kovacevich said in an email. "But disclosing the exact details would only help spammers, make search engines less useful, and hurt our users."
Foundem, one of the complainants in the EU case, has said it is not seeking to get Google to publish details of its algorithm. Instead, it said on the website searchneutrality.org, the company wants Google to be more transparent about the rationale for the various "exclusionary penalties" that can keep certain sites out of search results, and for Google to provide an appeals process for websites that feel such penalties have been mistakenly applied to them.
Foundem is a member of ICOMP, an online trade group that has received funding from Microsoft. One of the other complainants in the EU case, German price comparison site Ciao, is owned by Microsoft.
EASY FIX?
Google joins other technology giants, including Apple Inc AAPL.O, Intel Corp INTC.O and Microsoft, whose business practices have triggered scrutiny from European regulators.
Microsoft, which was fined 1.68 billion euros over the course of its decade-plus battle with the Commission, agreed to give European consumers better access to rival Internet browsers in Windows and to improve interoperability with its products last December.
The key challenge for the Commission now is to show that Google conscientiously abused its power in the search market to harm certain websites, said Brett Gordon, a professor at Columbia Business School.
"The Commission would have to show that Google unfairly tampered with their algorithm to disadvantage other search services," he said. Last week, France's antitrust watchdog warned the company not to abuse its dominant position in online advertising, citing a list of possible anti-competitive practices.
Google had settled with the French regulator two months earlier when it pledged to make its AdWords advertising policy in that country more clear and transparent following a complaint it had unfairly scrapped a company's contract. A similar tactic could work with the European Commission, said Christopher Thomas, a partner at law firm Hogan Lovells.
"The issue is not the algorithms, the issue is whether they can be changed in a way to sufficiently reassure the Commission without undermining what Google feels is the core of its business. If easy changes can be made, Google may be inclined to do that," he said. One thing's for sure: The pressure on Google can only grow, said Thomas Vinje, a partner at Clifford Chance, who had led a coalition that took on Microsoft. That then led to the European Commission imposing a total fine of 1.68 billion euros for antitrust infringements.
"The launch of formal probes tends to generate more voices, to cause more people to jump into the fray, and make it more likely that other complainants will come forward with other allegations of abusive conduct," he said.
"So this case might well go on for quite some time."
